media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Now, Isis, my sweet.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Perfect, my love.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Let's go home.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: So, our new cat burglar's a woman.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Hmm, probably my imagination.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Probably not.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Magnificent.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I suggest you save the flattery for the judge.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: So long, Dark Knight.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Drop in any time.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're too kind.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'll have to try and trim those claws.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Left you behind, did she?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Thanks for the memento.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Next, we'll be auctioning off a date with Gotham's most eligible bachelor,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Mr. Bruce Wayne.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: If Mr. Wayne would be good enough to step up,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: now, now, don't be shy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Ah, there he is.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, Bruce, I'm so happy to see you.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Where have you been?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, have I missed you?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I've been pinching my pennies for you.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Excuse me, ladies.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Remember, we've got lots of animals to save,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: so we're going to start the bidding at $500.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We have six.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Do I hear seven?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Well, well, that's $1,000.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Going once?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Going twice?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Do I hear any more bids?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Then sold for $10,000 to Ms. Selena Kyle.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I've never seen her before.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Rumor has it she's a wildlife nut.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: She's supposed to be sponsoring a mountain lion preserve

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: outside Gotham.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It's a pleasure.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Mr. Wayne, my secretary, Maven.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: How do you do?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Uh, please, Bruce, I'm very flattered.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Please understand.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It's purely for the animals, Mr. Wayne.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're off the hook.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: But you're not.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I beg your pardon.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You bought a date, and I'm on her bound and delighted to deliver.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I warn you, I'm not a man who gives up easily.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Lunch there.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I wonder what's going on?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, where'd he go?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Watch yourselves, men.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: These guys are crazy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Thanks, friend.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What's going down?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: This morning, I get a warning from the feds.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Red Claw is in Gotham.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Red Claw is the most ruthless terrorist leader in the world.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And we don't even have a picture of the guy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'll see what I can do from my end.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: There's no telling what they're up to.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Nothing's safe with these savages in town.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Aren't you even a little excited about your date?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I mean, Bruce Wayne is tall, dark, and disgustingly rich.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'd rather it were Batman.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, you should have seen him, Maven.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: He had the eyes of a lion.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Now, Mr. Bruce Wayne is on his way up.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Here we go.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Come on, Selena.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: At least he's a good connection.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You might be able to use him.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Yes, I know.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I suppose you're right.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Still, I wish it were Batman standing behind this door.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Bruce, how wonderful to see you.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Please, come in.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're even more stunning than I remember.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'll just put these in some water.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Selena, it's your lawyer.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: He says the deal is off.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Give me that.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Martin, what happened?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: That's ridiculous.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You tell him I want to meet with him.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: No, today he can't sell to Multigon.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We had an agreement.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Uh, nice flowers.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What's going on?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Selena was negotiating for land for a wildlife preserve.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Some cartel just muscled her out of the deal.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What do you mean he won't take your calls?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You go there and kick down the door if you have to.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I want that land for the mountain lions.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'm afraid I'm not going to be very good company.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Is there anything I can do?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Not really, unless you can get me a meeting

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: with the chairman of Multigon International.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What time's good for you?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Hey, I'm starting to like this guy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Really, Wayne?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I do wish there was something I could do for you

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: and your lovely friend, but the deal is quite set.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You see, we're committed to building a major resort.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Golf course, tennis courts, bocce ball, the whole shot.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: That's insane.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: The land's in the middle of nowhere.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It's worthless except to wild cats.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: My dear, you just don't understand development potential.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: As for the cats, Multigon will take care of them.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: One way or another.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I've given you all the time I could spare.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Ah, you'll find more time for me, Mr. Stern.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Before I'm through, I'll have every environmental group

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: and animal rights activists breathing down your neck.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: They'll be looking at you and your project so closely,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: you'll feel like a bug in a bell jar.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Have a nice day.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'm afraid that Selena Kyle may be troubled.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We've come too far to have our plans jeopardized

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: by some environmental fanatic.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Have someone keep an eye on Ms. Kyle.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'm afraid I wasn't much help after all.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Well, at least now I know what their cover story is.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You know, it's awfully late for lunch.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Would you mind if I took a rain check on our date?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: That'll give me time to take care of some business tonight.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Actually, I plan to work late myself.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And so, boys, we gotta increase our cut in the gambling operations.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Anybody got a problem with that?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Back off, boys.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I want a word with your boss, but you can listen.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What do you want?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What do you know about Red Claw?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Why you asking us? We're no terrorists.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're still scum, and you hear things I don't.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I want Red Claw.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And until I get him, I'm going to lean extra hard on you

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: and all the other mob bosses.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: If you think I've been bad news before...

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I-I get the picture. I'll see what I can do.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: If Stern won't admit what's going on,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: we'll have to find out for ourselves.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Despite our loss of arms, thanks to Batman's interference,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: we're going to proceed according to plan.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Tomorrow at 2300 hours,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: a train under military escort will pass through Gotham.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It will be transporting a strain of viral plague

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: that Interpol confiscated from our Eastern laboratories.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I cannot overemphasize the importance of that plague to our cause.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I believe Beethoven's ode to joy will do the trick.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Remind me to thank Mama for the piano lessons.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Outstanding.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We hit the train outside the city at this point.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What is that?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: A cat at the end of its nine lives.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: All right, I'm done.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: She's in the ventilation system.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I think we ran over our heads.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: She's down here, hurry!

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Hang on, Isis.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Isis, jump!

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: That was for saving my cat.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Is that all it was for?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I heard gunfire.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Occupational hazard.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: No, let's keep the mystery.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: If I don't unmask you, the police will.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Police? Don't be silly.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You can't deny there's something between us.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're right.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And I'm afraid it's the law.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Never trifle with the affections of a woman until next time.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And there will be next time.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, tough night.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It had its ups and downs,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: but I did get pictures of the fun family resort site.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It looks like there's some kind of abandoned military facility underground.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Very interesting.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We may save those mountain lions yet.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: But who is going to save you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This tea is tepid, Mr. Lint.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm sorry, Sir Lionel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's a cold night, and we're a long way from shore.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Shh! Do you hear that?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ah, yes. The perfect spot. Now, we have work to do.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Break out the bagpipes.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Very good. Okay, here we go.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you think this will work, sir?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: They do say music soothes the savage beast, Mr. Lint.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm not sure in this case, sir.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is the camera to hand? It is essential.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Under your seat, sir.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Let those fellows at the club scoff

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: when faced with irrefutable proof.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I should've joined the army.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Sir Lionel? - Hmm?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Darwin's finches! She's real!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I knew it. I knew it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, she's a spirited one, isn't she? Ha-ha!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Hold this, will you? -Whoa!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: A little to the right, please.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, no, no. My right.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That's it, that's it. Now, what do we say?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, Mr. Lint. What else do we say?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: My hands are bleeding!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Can we say "cheese"? -Please!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Close enough.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: A carnivore. Huh.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do buck up, Mr. Lint. No harm done.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, fiddlesticks.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I can't take any more of this. I won't!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You were mauled by a prehistoric lake monster.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How many people can claim that?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: None. Because they're all dead!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I thought you were made of sterner stuff.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What is wrong with you? I'm a human being!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, one of over one-and-a-half billion.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But that creature, on the other hand,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: is one of a kind. Don't you see?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, I see perfectly well.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's no wonder you can't keep anyone around.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do stay, Mr. Lint.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'll make absolutely sure you don't get eaten again. I promise.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You said that last time!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: If I'm ever to be taken seriously by the adventuring community,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I must... I must provide proof, yes.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You see, my mistake was relying on these newfangled cameras.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We'll go back. We'll get some real evidence.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -We can-- -No, we shall not.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You, sir, are on your own.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, bother.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "Dear Sir Lionel Frost, as famed seeker of mythical beasts,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "you may be interested in this proposition.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "I can reveal to you the as-yet-undiscovered creature

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "known as the Sasquatch.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "Follow the trail along Old Kemp Creek in Washington State,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "and you will find him.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "I am truly the real deal, and I...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I believe you are, too."

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Old Kemp Creek. I knew it. Ha-ha!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The game is afoot!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ha-ha! A foot. It's a... Hmm. Right.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, it's you. You know I have strict orders not to--

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, yes, very good, thank you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There he stood before me,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: his wicked heathen eyes locked on mine.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No sound but the wind whistling through his grass skirt.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Then, in a flash, I fell to one knee,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: thrust my hand down my trouser leg,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: whipped out a pistol I had concealed against my inner thigh,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: aimed it right between his eyes,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and dropped him where he stood quicker than you could say, "God save the Queen."

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How do you like that, hmm?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: A noble battle.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Thank heaven he wasn't armed.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And then what happened?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, I wasn't out of the woods yet.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Not by a long shot.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The one thing that still stood in my way was--

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sir Lionel Frost!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Gentlemen...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I bring thrilling news.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, it's the monster hunter.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This club is for members only.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What is it this time, Frost?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Did you come to tell us about Nessie?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ah, Lord Piggot-Dunceby.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Why don't you show us what proof you found in the loch, hmm?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, a regrettable conclusion to an otherwise rather promising expedition.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But I'm not here to bemoan past misfortune.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I am here to unveil my latest

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and most tantalizing enterprise, gentlemen.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Here he goes again.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Now wait. - Give it up, man.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -What I have here is a cast... -Oh!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: ...of a giant, non-human footprint.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -That's a big foot. -I bet he's a big fellow. Heh.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: One of dozens of documented eyewitness reports

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: of a mysterious creature.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Do you mind? -Oh.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Huge, hairy, and walking upright.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Neither ape nor man,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but the link in between.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, he's had many names:

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Skookum, Rougarou,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Tse'nahaha, Loo Poo Oi'Yes...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: ...and most commonly known in... in a muddled derivation of an old Halkomelem dialect,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -as Sasquatch. -Heh. That'll never catch on.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I offer you a glimpse of a legendary creature lost in time

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and proof-- proof, I tell you--

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: that man's primate ancestors are not just tall tales and flights of fancy,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but alive and well

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and living in the New World.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -The very thought of it. -Well, I never!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Poppycock! - But think of it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Evidence of man's primitive ancestry, the missing link!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, sir, I shan't think of it. I won't.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Uh... -Look around you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You stand beneath the most renowned adventurers of the world.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The members of this club have crossed oceans,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: tamed jungles, conquered the tallest peaks.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We've butchered the ungodly...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: ...and brought good British table manners

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: to savages the world over.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You, sir, seek to make a mockery of us.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, no, no. I seek to join you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And the discovery of this creature

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: must surely secure my place here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, what do you say to that?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I say we are descended from great men,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: not great apes.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, I say you're wrong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I... I believe the two go hand in hand,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -and what's more, I-- -What did he say to me?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I think he said you're wrong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I have heard enough.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Your words are nothing.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: My word is everything. What is yours worth?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I beg your pardon?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I give you my word I'll bring back proof of this creature,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and in return, you'll admit you're wrong,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and you'll grant me membership here,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: so I might finally take my place where I truly belong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You do not belong here, and you will fail.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, in that case, you have nothing to lose.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You'll swear on it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Then you'll excuse me if I take my leave.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I, uh... I have much to prepare.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Until next we meet, gentlemen.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: These are dark days, Collick.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Electricity, suffrage, evolution.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We are on the brink of a precipice.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, mark my words. And the ground beneath us

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: is clawed away by these... these new thinkers.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: They'll change the world,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and there'll be no room in it for the likes of me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But, my Lord,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Frost's frivolous escapades usually amount to naught.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He can't possibly win this wager.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm not taking any chances!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, I must make a stand for all that is civilized.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But how are you going to do that, my Lord?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Gonna hire a thug to kill him.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, yes. That'll do it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Stop, please!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Please wait!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's still there.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Excuse me. I think I've got a little something stuck in my...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There it is.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: In my throat. Like a nut or a...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: or a field mouse or something like that. I don't know.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Am I rambling? I'm a little nervous, if I'm being honest.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sir Lionel Frost, I presume.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't believe it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, you can speak.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes. And, um, I write as well.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: My penmanship isn't great, but, uh...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: you know, opposable thumbs and...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: fat fingers, you know?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How can you speak?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Good question. How can I speak?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, I watched at first. I listened.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I paid attention to a lot of things.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I learned, I stole books, newspapers here and there.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, an old shaman in the valley helped me a little.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Not only that, he taught me how to play chess.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Smart shaman. -Not really.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, I beat him every time. He's a lousy player.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And he cheats. He's a cheater.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're exactly as I imagined.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Eight feet tall, chest circumference 70 inches,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: total weight around 650 pounds.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, I'd say it's more like, you know, 630 pounds.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know, it's the hair that makes me look heavier, I think.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's a... It's a little deceptive. It can be frustrating.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh! Look at the size of those metatarsals.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Whoa, sir! Wow, your hands!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Do you mind if I smell you? -Um, yeah, sure.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, I bathed recently.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know, like, two weeks ago in a creek.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, so, should... You didn't drink from the creek, did you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Remarkable.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, wait. So, you called me by my...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How do you know me?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I wrote the letter.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You wrote this?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You asked me here to discover you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, discov... No, no, no.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I asked you here to help me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Over this way.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, God, I'm so embarrassed. Sorry if it smells a little.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't entertain that much.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: If I might ask, how did you find me?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, well, I've read all about you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I think that one's my favorite, right there.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Let's see. I think there might be a picture.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes. You can't believe everything you read, can you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Let's move along, shall we?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, I need someone who knows the wild places of the world,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: someone who believes in my existence,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but, you know, doesn't want to shoot me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - You're not gonna shoot me, are you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But if you'd explain, what exactly do you ask of me?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Take me away from this place.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm lonely.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Your world, it... it grows bigger.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Mine is eaten away.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know, there's nothing for me here anymore.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I've walked these woods year after year, but I'm the last.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I have none of my kind to live with,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: no... no family.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Really, nobody.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: many miles away, on the other side of the world,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: they talk of this-- this creature.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He's a snowman.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -A yeti? -And... And look at this.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I think these yetis are my cousins.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: They're... They're my kind.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I want to go to that cold place and find them.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And then...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: um, I wouldn't have to spend the rest of my life alone.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Can you just take me there?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Take you to the Himalayas?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I can't possibly.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, you can. If anyone can, it's you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're a... You're a great man.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Mm, that's a tantalizing proposition, I'll admit.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You must understand,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: my objective here was to find proof of you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, my name depends upon it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Proof? What kind of proof?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Incontrovertible evidence of your existence

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: to prove my doubters wrong,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: uh, like hair samples, a tooth,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: nail clippings, feces.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, I have all those things. That seems like a fair deal.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: In that case, why not?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I shall get you there, to the place you belong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And in return, you will get me to mine.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, yes. I'll prove the existence of not just one,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but an entire evolutionary branch of missing links.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Imagine the headlines then.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, wow! You really mean that? You're gonna take me?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Of course. I give you my word.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Okay. What is it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -What? -Your word.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, it's a figure of speech.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sounds good. What is it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The word, my dear fellow,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: is "trust."

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, so, you want the poop now?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, later will be fine.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Right. And... what do I call you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, if we're to travel halfway across the globe, you'll need a name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, there's never really been anyone around to give me a name, you know?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hmm. That won't do.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I... I think I still carry the papers of my valet, Mr. Lemuel Lint.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We'll simply change the "T" to a "K,"

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and then we have the perfect cover story.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know, like... missing link.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Wait, I don't get it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, fine. Then to business. We have much to do.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, sir. Where do we start?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: With the work of the late Aldous Fortnight.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He and I shared the same, um, shall we say, pursuits.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, before his untimely death.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: A singular man. Primatologist, poet laureate,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and sometime fullback for the Blackheath Football Club.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, I like the sound of that guy.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Spent much of his life searching for the elusive yeti.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And the best part of all, he drew a map.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: All right, let me just-- Can I just ask a... Hmm?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You think Mr. Fortnight's widow will give it to us, just like that?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Don't fret, Mr. Link. You just leave Adelina to me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh. Oh, so, the two of you are acquainted.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You can say that again.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Okay. So, the two of you are acquainted.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What I... What I mean is, Adelina and I were...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: well, more than just acquaintances.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Wait a second. I said, "Oh!" like I knew what you were talking about, but I don't.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Never mind. - First things first.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We shall get some sleep and sustenance.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Whoo! I barely know you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What, here?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know what? I'm fine. I'll wait out here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We'll keep a low profile

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and be out of here by first light.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -I can't go in there. -Well, not as you are, no.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But at the very least, we should cover up your, uh...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: ... modesty.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Put this on.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sir Lionel, I'm a little afraid that this isn't gonna work.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, come now. I imagine everyone in there

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: has hairy knuckles and poor hygiene.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You'll fit right in.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ooh! Excuse me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What can I get you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hmm. We'll need lodging for the night.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And a cup of Earl Grey tea with a spot of milk.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And please don't let it steep too long. Thanks so much.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Lionel Frost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sir Lionel Frost, actually.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, you seem to have me at a disadvantage.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And that's just how I like it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Willard Stenk. Pleased to meet you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ah, Stenk. Yes, I know of your work.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You've tracked, trapped and butchered

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: every rare creature from here to Borneo.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're gonna make me blush here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And by my reckoning, there's one that has eluded you

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: for 30 years or more.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is that right?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The Sasquatch appears to have you beat, Mr. Stenk.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The Sasquatch? Ha!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: If you think you can do better, Frost, you're out of your mind.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You hear me? Barking mad.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No. It can't be.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, but I'm afraid it can. And it is.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And you didn't. And I did.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Mmm. You're beautiful.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, can you hold on one second? I'm uncomfortable.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Don't believe a word of it. He'd sooner see you stuffed

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: or have your head mounted on a wall,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and perhaps use your foot as one of those, you know, buckets you put umbrellas in.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Wha... No, thank you!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Gotta get myself a grip here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That's better. Regretfully, Sir Lionel,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: turns out the job I've been hired to do

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: ain't no fool's errand after all.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Oh? -I've been paid a pretty sum

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: to stop you and this creature

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: from ever reaching civilized society.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Quite a catch.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I get to bag two legends in one day.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, I wouldn't count on it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, I might've known Piggot-Dunceby would send one of his rabid mutts

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: to do his dirty work.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No hard feelings, Frost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Hyah! -Aah!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Except that one.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you think you have things in hand, Mr. Link?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - I'll be right back. - Okay.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, no, you don't.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sorry, old girl.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, boy. That is gonna let in an awful draft.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Not to worry, Mr. Link. We're not stopping after all.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It seems Piggot-Dunceby is set on scuppering my success at any cost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We must make haste for Santa Ana, California.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Lord Piggot-Dunceby!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Lord Piggot-Dunceby, a telegram!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You have a telegra...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's from Stenk.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No. It can't be true.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -No... Mm. -No one must know of this, do you hear?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -We must redouble our efforts. -Yeah.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Frost must not succeed! -Eh?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Get word to Stenk, and-- and tell him to stay on their trail.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Right. -To the end of the world if he has to.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you hear me? The end of the world!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Very good, Collick. Run along now.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Running along, yes, running along.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Just running along.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: All aboard!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, how did Mr. Fortnight die, exactly?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Buried by an avalanche on the Hindu Kush.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Didn't know what hit him. -Ow!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm gonna say it was the snow that hit him.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He never completed his quest. Died in the trying.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This feels very confined.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I feel woozy. Do I look pale? I feel pale.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, stop fidgeting, Mr. Link. You mustn't draw attention to yourself.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, I'm not very comfortable stealing a man's clothes.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, you can't very well walk around naked.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's indecent.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yeah, but... I mean, his underwear, too?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It just seems a little...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, I turned them inside-out and all, but...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is it hot in here? I think I need some air.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Fine, fine. By all means, crack open the win...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, that's better.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This way, please.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Señora doesn't normally see guests.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yeah. I'm the same way. Probably because my cave smells like sh--

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Should you perhaps wait here?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Try not to shed on the cashmere.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you shed?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, let me see if I understand.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You plan to travel all the way around the world to the Himalayas,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: looking for this, uh, legendary creature.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And to do this, you need the map

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: that my dearest husband was holding in his hand

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: when they pulled his poor, dead body

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: out of the ice that killed him on the mountain.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, that's right.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is this... everything that you are here to say to me?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Did I leave something out?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He was your friend.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, absolutely. Like a brother to me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And you did not even go to his funeral.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, well, goodbyes are so tricky.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You and Aldous... what happened to you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, come, now, Adelina. I think you know the answer to that.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It was over between us, Lionel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And Aldous was there for me in ways you never were.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, how fortunate for you both.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ugh! I can't even look at you right now.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -There. -There?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There, there, Adelina.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There's no need to get upset. Such a sensitive creature.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It saddens me to see you shut away in this old house,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: surrounded by memories of times long past.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Like a... Like an unhappy bird locked in a cage.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You were always such a...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: such a vibrant, spirited, intoxicating woman.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Stop! -Ow!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What is wrong with you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You think I cannot see?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You come here because you want something,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and you think you can charm me and you can flatter me

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and I will do just as you say.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, could we go through it again?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Same old Lionel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Eyes only for your legend, for Lionel's prize.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You will get out of my house.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Adelina, you have me all wrong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I... I see how much your husband's legacy means to you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I would never wish to obtain the map

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: by insincere flimflammery.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No. I will pay you for it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Come along, Mr. Link.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Salga de mi casa! - Um...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Fuera! Fuera de mi casa!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We aren't gonna break in, are we?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, that's against the law.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, please, Mr. Link. This is America.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Put this on.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hey, Sir Lionel. Sorry.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you have a size bigger?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I think I put a run in it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: On your head. It's a disguise.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We're not here to perform burlesque.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Look, just forget about the stocking.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Here. Now throw this rope over the wall.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What... What did you just do?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, what do you mean? I threw the rope over the wall.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I didn't mean all of it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, you never said that. I'm very literal.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Oh, you don't say? -No, I do say.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I just said that right then. Aren't you listening?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Now what are we gonna do?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You said throw the rope over, so I threw the rope over.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Why don't you just throw this over as well?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Okay, never mind.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You'll have to climb the wall and pull me up.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Okay, I'm not very good at climbing.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, for pity's sake. Of course you are. Look at your arms.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hmm. That's a good point.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That's a good point.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Aah! No! Ooh! Aah!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, do hurry up.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're making too much noise.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Ow. -Do you think you can lift it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -I guess so. -Then get it over to the window

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and throw it out into the bushes.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'll keep watch.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What are you doing?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Just one second, please.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Almost there.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Is there a problem? -Why don't you just play a trumpet

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and sing "The Star-Spangled Banner" while you're at it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I could give it a try. Oh, but I don't have a trumpet.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And I don't know that song that well.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Wait. You don't want me to do that.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm on to you, mister. I am on to you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -You terrible thieves! -A fair assessment.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Lionel Frost!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I know this is you in there.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I do not even want to know how you got this.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
