text: There was a nun. We mugged her.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, my dear. I think you've made a mistake.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're right, it's me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How could you tell?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Give me back my husband's map.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Adelina, I think...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Someone is shooting at you, and it isn't me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Did you steal from him as well?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We really don't have time for this.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean to get to the Himalayas,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -and I need your map to do it. -Not so fast.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Please, Adelina. What possible need could you have for this?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Something you said to me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It is time for this unhappy bird...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: ...to break out of her cage.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Adelina? -That's right, Sir Lionel Frost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And your big, hairy f...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -I'm sorry. Who's this? -I'll explain later.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, I don't care. The point is, I'm coming with you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't really have a say in the matter, do I?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Para nada. -All right, fine.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Quickly! We must climb aboard!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Huh? -The train is leaving!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What? We will miss it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Change of plan. We must give this villain the slip.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, no, you don't.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Follow me. We must find an alternative route.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No time to dawdle.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hyah! Hyah!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: From New York, we can find passage to London

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and easily navigate the European continent by rail.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: On through India, and from there,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: it's just a tidy step to the foothills of the Himalayas

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and our ultimate destination: Shangri-La.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Shangri-La? No!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I can't believe it! Oh, my goodness! This sounds...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, my goodness! That is great!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This can't be happ...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What is that, exactly?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is it a... Is it a place?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It has been called many names:

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Shambhala, Agartha,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: the Valley of the Blue Moon.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Legend says it is a place of uncommon beauty.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: An earthly Eden where man never grows old.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Actually, Aldous believed

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: that this story was not quite right.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He believed that the valley was not the home of men who had never aged,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but of men who had never evolved.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Like me? -Like you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes. Yes, that's right.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: An undiscovered civilization of yetis,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: living and flourishing in isolation.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Quite a tall tale, but I think he was on to something.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And I will follow in his footsteps

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: all the way to the prize.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But I don't see a path to Shangri-La on this map.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Just directions to Gamu? What's that?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Not what, but who.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The exact location of the mythical valley was thought lost,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -but Aldous learned-- -Aldous, Aldous.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Excuse me, it's my turn. -Carry on.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Aldous learned of a mountain guide named Gamu

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: who knew the secret ways through the mountains.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Aldous believed if we find Shangri-La,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: we find the yeti.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, and then, Mr. Link,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: you will at last be united with your lost brethren.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm a quiet guy at heart,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but do you mind if I just kind of...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: growl a little bit in excitement?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That was fun.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, let's not get overexcited, shall we?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know, I really didn't think it was possible.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And yet here you are in front of my face.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I cannot believe it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: All these years, my husband searched for this.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I wish he could have been here to see it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hmm. Poor Adelina.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That does not mean I'm happy about you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That is really rather unreasonable, I must say.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know what? I'm gonna just be over here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm gonna stare out the window for a long time.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, my word. Look at... What is that, the sky?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hyah! Hyah!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Oh, do hurry it up. - Be patient.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Can't you see poor Mr. Link is nervous?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, believe me, he's got a lot more to worry about than boarding this boat.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What do you mean?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, Adelina.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Let me say this very clearly.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The hunter that follows us

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: will not give up the chase easily. You understand?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He's still on our tail. Have no doubt.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: If he catches us, he will shoot you dead, skin you,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and have your pelt as his hearthrug.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And if that happens, well, then...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, I have... I'll have no chance of winning my wager.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Stenk followed them on board a cargo steamer bound for London.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He says he'll deliver them to you, dot-dot-dot,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: dead or alive, exclamation mark.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hire thugs. Bribe the port authorities.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: As soon as that ship reaches dry land,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: we'll be waiting for them.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Qué es lo que quiere éste ahora?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What do you say to a peace offering?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Eh. I don't mind if I do.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hmm. Yes, I thought perhaps we might clear the air.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, no, no. My air is clear.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But Mr. Link? I think perhaps his air is all stuffed up.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He thinks so highly of you, Lionel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He really believes in you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - And yet you treat him so poorly.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Name one time that I've ever treated him poorly.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You poke him with your stick.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You make him carry your bag like he's your servant.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -You tell him he smells of wet dog. -Yes, I said name one.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You put yourself first and always Mr. Link second.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Adelina, that's simply not true.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is that really what you think of me?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, now, steady on...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You do not seem so steady yourself.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Perhaps it is time you made a step

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: in a different direction.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I haven't the faintest idea of what you're talking about.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Look at him.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: His hope rests in your hand, Lionel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Talk to him.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Can't you do it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Go now, or I'll throw you overboard.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh. Sir Lionel. I, uh...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: was just getting some fresh air.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh... you seem, um,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: you seem troubled, Mr. Link.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sir Lionel, have you ever wanted something so bad

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: it hurt inside, like gas, but sadder?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hmm. Well... yes.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: As a matter of fact, I have.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: As long as I can remember, I...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I wished to become a great adventurer,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: respected throughout the Empire.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, it hasn't quite worked out that way.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But someday.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, someday people will remember my deeds

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and know my name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Of course they will.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Your name is gonna go down in history

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: as the world's greatest adventurer.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Now, not the greatest, surely.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: At least you have a name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: One of your own, I mean.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't think "Mr. Link" really counts.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, then... perhaps we might remedy that.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -What do you mean? -You must choose a name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, a name that has special meaning to you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, perhaps...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: perhaps the name of someone in your life

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: who touched you... here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Heart. Your heart.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, some years back,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: there was a young prospector who came to live in the woods

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: to try their luck on the high mountain rivers.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: One day, they came close to my cave,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: while out picking berries.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And they saw me, and they were just standing there.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And when I looked at them,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: they didn't scream, didn't turn and run away like most people do.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: They just... They just smiled.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And that smile meant the world to me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And... And what was the prospector's name?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Su... Susan?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yeah, Susan. That should be my name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, this prospector was a girl?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, that's correct.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, then that is a girl's name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, yes, I...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um... it suits you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Now we must rest.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We have a long way to go, but I assure you,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: we will reach the Himalayas

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and find this lost civilization of yetis, this Shangri-La.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We will find your place.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Good night, uh...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Wow, that was positively altruistic, if I do say so myself.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Adelina? What's wrong?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What, are you lost for words?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Stenk! Leave her alone.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Your fight is with me. -Mm-hmm.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Put your hands where I can see 'em.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Huh? -Whoa. No.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Aah! Quit yankin' on my shooter!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Lionel, look out! Get your hands off of him!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Get off of me!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hey, you! Don't you touch him!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I got you now.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: MR. - I can't reach!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The life buoy! The life buoy!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Throw the life buoy! -Okay.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That's a little bit below the belt, isn't it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh God. Okay...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I've got ya!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Could you hold on a second?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And he's got a defenseless girl!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Monster? -Defenseless?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Get 'em! -Come on!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, and-and, Mr. Link, keep your trousers on, please.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There's a good chap.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Aw, shoot. The boss ain't gonna like this.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Are you positive about this, Mr. Stenk?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, yeah. A whole lost world is what he said.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Big-footed critters as far as the eye can see.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I won't stand for it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's a mockery of man!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: A sham of civilized society!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'll run this game to ground if it's the last thing I do.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: All things considered, I think he took that quite well.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Come along, Mr. Link.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We're one step ahead of our adversaries,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: so let's keep it that way.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And, uh, well, we can enjoy the view while we're about.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, are we gonna need the boat again?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There's so many beautiful things in the world.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, Lionel, look.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, remarkable.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This is just like old times, wouldn't you say?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, uh... although the Sasquatch is new.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Aw, he's all tuckered out.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: He's come a long way.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I think we all have.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Good morning.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Mm-mm-mm. - Oh, Lionel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I say, old chap, could you loosen your grip?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: My, uh, arms have gone dead.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - So, what's going on? - Are we nearly there yet?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Almost, Susan, almost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We'll soon have you frolicking in the snow

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: with huge, hairy ape-men. Just you wait and see.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, boy. A guy could dream.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes, this is it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But, Lionel...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: where do we go from here?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: From here, my dear, we shall rely

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: on my extensive anthropological knowledge

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and my keen eye for local custom.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you understand English?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes. Hello? Hello? Excuse me, sir.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Would you please direct us to Gamu?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you understand?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The Englishman abroad.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, that's a little bit rude.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I said it's rude!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Heh. We are walking untrodden paths through the Himalayas, Mr. Link.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This is merely a local greeting.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Pleased to meet you!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You seek Gamu?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: She's my grandmother.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I will take you to her.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I must warn you, she does not like visitors,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: 'cause she is old and rude and prefers solitude.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Also, please do not, whatever you do,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - mention the... - chicken.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -The chicken? -Yes, please.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Never, ever mention the chicken.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Of course not. -We understand.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No chicken, got it. Zip.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, greetings, venerable Gamu.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -It is an honor. -What's with the chicken?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What is he talking about?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hmm, she says you must join her for supper.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'm sorry, what is this?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, no, thanks. I don't eat meat.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, I do eat bacon and squirrel and chicken.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No, not chicken. I eat fish. I said fish.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We mustn't insult our host, Mr. Link. Eat it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Mmm. It's delicious.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: perhaps we can try some of your tea.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It is made from yak butter.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, do you have anything that doesn't come from a yak?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yak is our life.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yak is milk, meat, clothes, friend.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Unusual bouquet.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And it smells funny, too.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Oh, that is not the tea. -No? What is it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Dung. We burn it for fuel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yak, of course.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I really shouldn't be having one of these,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but, oh, they're so good.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Gamu, if I may,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: we have traveled many thousands of miles

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: to find a place lost in the mountains,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: a place I think you know.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Some call it... Shangri-La.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This place you seek is not lost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It is hidden, hidden by choice.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Perhaps it is the men who seek it who are lost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Then you know of it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And I know it is not a place for man.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It is not a place for you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's for me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Um... -You have killed my grandmother!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Quick, quick, quick! Someone should give her the kiss of life!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're the man for the job.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How's my breath?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You killed her again!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I was mistaken.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You are right to take him to his kind, where he belongs.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Then you will guide us?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You got to be kidding.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I will give my granddaughter directions.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Go! Get out!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Get out of my house!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I asked you nicely,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but I'm not gonna ask you again.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Tell us what you told them!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, Mr. Stenk, you're doing this all wrong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You mustn't threaten the defenseless old woman.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How about the chicken?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What chicken?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No! You must threaten her defenseless grandson instead.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh! Brother.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Who is it that comes before us?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sir Lionel Frost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And if I might ask, how the devil can you speak English so well?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How can you speak English so well?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, Eton, obviously.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How do you know I'm not speaking yeti?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Look, I'm not sure exactly where this is taking us.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is there anything wrong with staying exactly where we are?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do you always speak in questions?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't know. Do I?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I have a question for you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Why did you guide us here at the tip of a spear?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We do not wield weapons to threaten, but to defend.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That doesn't make them any less sharp.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -You speak with some wisdom. -I state the obvious.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Often that is the same thing.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, here is an absolute.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We do not seek glory or riches.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We're not here to pillage your temple

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: or disturb your tranquility.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We want nothing from you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Then why are you here?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That is me. Sorry.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, but of course.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The country cousin.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The... redneck.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Actually...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Sorry. Actually, I'd say more...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I think it's more... I think it's more of a rust, isn't it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: People say red. I find I'm more of an auburn.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I have a lot of autumn in me, a lot of autumn colors.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, so, you know, we...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Anyway, I figured maybe there was a place for me here, among you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Come this way.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, this is it, Shangri-La.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Myth made real.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Shangri-La? That is not our name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We call it...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: How phlegmatic. What does it mean?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: "Keep out. We hate you."

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This valley is unsullied, precious.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And so it shall remain.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There is no place for you among us.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But you're my kind, you're my fa... my family.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No. I think not.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It seems to me, you did not have to travel

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: halfway around the world to find your kind.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Man, killer of life, of hope, of dreams.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Man talks of the magic of the world,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but it is a prize,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: something to be claimed as proof of his worth.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I mean, she has a point.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: These secrets you have seen, they are ours, and ours alone.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The outside world must never learn the truths

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: of our sacred valley.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That is something we cannot allow.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: She's gonna kill us!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We are not monsters.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: For a minute there, I thought, just for a second, that maybe you were going--

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Throw them into the Inescapable Pit of Isolation

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and Miserable Disappointment.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh. I'm sorry, what?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There, you will spend the rest of your lives

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: pondering your ill transgressions.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You can't keep us here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's barbaric!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It is preservation.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You fiends!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, this is awful.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I'll be the laughingstock of the club, again.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yo no puedo creer.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Look at him.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: His dream is crushed, and you...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: you only talk of yourself.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Well, what about my dreams?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What? To belong to that silly club?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: These men do not like you, they do not respect you,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: they do not believe the things that you believe.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, why? Why do you wish to be one of them?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Be... Because...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Because they said I couldn't.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You and Susan are not different at all,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: wanting to belong in all the wrong places.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You could never understand.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know something, Lionel?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: All this time, I'm thinking you care more about these legends you chase

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: than you do about people, but I'm wrong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: There's only one legend Sir Lionel Frost really cares about.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is it a unicorn?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh. Wait. You mean me, don't you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You were never interested in anyone but yourself.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And yet, you are surprised that you always end up alone.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You have me wrong.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I am better than you think I am.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You talk about proof, but all you offer are words.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Where is this great man, Sir Lionel?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Where is the proof of him? Where is the proof of his worth?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I think perhaps the great Sir Lionel Frost...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It is time to settle our debt, Susan.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I promised I'd take you to the place you belong,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and I'm a man of my word.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The Elder is right. You don't belong here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Now, get up. We're leaving.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Now, hold me tightly.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Are you... Are you sure?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Um, Adelina's watching.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What? No, no. I want you to throw me out of the pit.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, I don't know. I think you might be a little too heavy.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Nonsense. Now, give it all you've got.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh. It's hard to know whose fault that was.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Let's do it again.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Adelina, throw something down.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: A rope would be better.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't know. Three more of them, and we could build a ramp.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, that feels lovely.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: nice place.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The people we don't want here are leaving!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Force them to stay!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Tie this to your waist.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We have a treacherous climb ahead of us. Quickly!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't think I have my knot... Aah!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This is where it ends, Frost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I can't allow you to go any further.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Look at you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Hand in hand with apes and women.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You'll never be one of us.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Quite right. I never shall.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You know, I really don't care to anymore.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I have changed my mind.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I... I have evolved.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: What? Heh! That's... That's preposterous.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Of course you want to be one of us.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We are great men!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: We shape the world!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's funny...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I actually used to think that.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But now... now I rather think the world shapes us.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That was pretty good, wasn't it?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: One of you should write that down.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Excuse me. Can I borrow your... -Hmm?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You would cast aside everything for that...

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: that... thing?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yes. Yes, I would.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And I'll have you know that that thing has a name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's Susan.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That thing is an abomination!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: That thing is more of a man than you'll ever be.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And what's more, he's my friend,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: which is a far better prize than any fellowship with the likes of you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: If you are still intent on doing him harm,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: then you'll have to find a way through me first.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And me also.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Yeah, and me.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -You don't do that. -Oh, yeah. Right.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Go through... Go through them.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You can keep your missing link

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: and your lost world.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're welcome to them.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: No one will ever know what you found here.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And no one will ever remember your name.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, my Lord?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Order will prevail!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Civilization endures!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You're a bad man.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, bugger.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, no, no!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ugh! Why am I always dangly?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Are we dead?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Seems you've had your day at last, Frost.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Now... Now here comes the thaw.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It doesn't have to be this way, Stenk.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Piggot-Dunceby's gone.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It ain't about the paycheck no more.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Now it's just a matter of shallow, self-centered pride.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Careful, Stenk. You know what they say pride comes before.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Wait, I know this.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Is it Tuesday?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Susan, try and reach the side!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I can't get a hold!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I wanted to say thank you

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: for what you said back there.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Ah, don't even mention it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: So, what happens now?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I don't know.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, well, it turns out I'm on the lookout for a new valet.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Uh, partner.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You wouldn't happen to know anyone, would you?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I could ask around if you want.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Maybe the guy in the village with the tongue. Would he be good?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You, Mr. Link. I mean you.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Oh, my goodness! Yes, then. Well, yes.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Of course! I do know someone!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Your utopia sucks!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Come along, Mr. Link.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -Yeah, and get a haircut! -That's enough.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And your accent's weird!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: - Bigger person, Mr. Link. - Be the bigger person.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You have seen the world.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Remember every moment of it, Susan.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And you, Adelina? What did you see?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I saw proof.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: You are a great man, Sir Lionel.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But I deserve greater.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: It's time I went on my own adventure.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Not for you, not for Aldous, not even for you, Susan.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But for myself.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Goodbye, gentlemen.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Were you leaning in for a kiss there?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I've been there before, yeah. I mean, I haven't,

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: but I could imagine that's how it would go down with me, too.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This is it, Mr. Link!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: The Fiji mermaid!

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: This, Mr. Link, might just provide the vital clue I need

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: to the greatest discovery of the century.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: But I thought we did Shangri-La already.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: -No, no. Atlantis. -You don't say?

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: I do say. I'd swear on it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: And you know I'm nothing if not a man of my--

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Your word, yes, got it.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Don't dally, my friend. Adventure awaits.

media_file: Missing.Link.2019.1080p.BluRay.x264-[YTS.LT].mp4
text: Do I have time to get my bathing suit? No?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Now, Isis, my sweet.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Perfect, my love.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Let's go home.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: So, our new cat burglar's a woman.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Hmm, probably my imagination.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Probably not.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Magnificent.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I suggest you save the flattery for the judge.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: So long, Dark Knight.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Drop in any time.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're too kind.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'll have to try and trim those claws.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Left you behind, did she?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Thanks for the memento.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Next, we'll be auctioning off a date with Gotham's most eligible bachelor,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Mr. Bruce Wayne.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: If Mr. Wayne would be good enough to step up,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: now, now, don't be shy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Ah, there he is.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, Bruce, I'm so happy to see you.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Where have you been?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, have I missed you?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I've been pinching my pennies for you.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Excuse me, ladies.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Remember, we've got lots of animals to save,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: so we're going to start the bidding at $500.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We have six.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Do I hear seven?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Well, well, that's $1,000.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Going once?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Going twice?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Do I hear any more bids?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Then sold for $10,000 to Ms. Selena Kyle.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I've never seen her before.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Rumor has it she's a wildlife nut.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: She's supposed to be sponsoring a mountain lion preserve

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: outside Gotham.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It's a pleasure.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Mr. Wayne, my secretary, Maven.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: How do you do?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Uh, please, Bruce, I'm very flattered.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Please understand.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It's purely for the animals, Mr. Wayne.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're off the hook.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: But you're not.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I beg your pardon.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You bought a date, and I'm on her bound and delighted to deliver.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I warn you, I'm not a man who gives up easily.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Lunch there.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I wonder what's going on?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, where'd he go?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Watch yourselves, men.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: These guys are crazy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Thanks, friend.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What's going down?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: This morning, I get a warning from the feds.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Red Claw is in Gotham.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Red Claw is the most ruthless terrorist leader in the world.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And we don't even have a picture of the guy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'll see what I can do from my end.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: There's no telling what they're up to.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Nothing's safe with these savages in town.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Aren't you even a little excited about your date?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I mean, Bruce Wayne is tall, dark, and disgustingly rich.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'd rather it were Batman.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Oh, you should have seen him, Maven.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: He had the eyes of a lion.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Now, Mr. Bruce Wayne is on his way up.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Here we go.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Come on, Selena.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: At least he's a good connection.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You might be able to use him.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Yes, I know.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I suppose you're right.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Still, I wish it were Batman standing behind this door.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Bruce, how wonderful to see you.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Please, come in.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're even more stunning than I remember.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'll just put these in some water.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Selena, it's your lawyer.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: He says the deal is off.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Give me that.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Martin, what happened?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: That's ridiculous.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You tell him I want to meet with him.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: No, today he can't sell to Multigon.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We had an agreement.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Uh, nice flowers.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What's going on?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Selena was negotiating for land for a wildlife preserve.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Some cartel just muscled her out of the deal.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What do you mean he won't take your calls?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You go there and kick down the door if you have to.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I want that land for the mountain lions.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'm afraid I'm not going to be very good company.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Is there anything I can do?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Not really, unless you can get me a meeting

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: with the chairman of Multigon International.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What time's good for you?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Hey, I'm starting to like this guy.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Really, Wayne?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I do wish there was something I could do for you

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: and your lovely friend, but the deal is quite set.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You see, we're committed to building a major resort.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Golf course, tennis courts, bocce ball, the whole shot.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: That's insane.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: The land's in the middle of nowhere.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: It's worthless except to wild cats.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: My dear, you just don't understand development potential.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: As for the cats, Multigon will take care of them.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: One way or another.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I've given you all the time I could spare.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Ah, you'll find more time for me, Mr. Stern.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Before I'm through, I'll have every environmental group

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: and animal rights activists breathing down your neck.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: They'll be looking at you and your project so closely,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: you'll feel like a bug in a bell jar.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Have a nice day.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'm afraid that Selena Kyle may be troubled.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: We've come too far to have our plans jeopardized

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: by some environmental fanatic.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Have someone keep an eye on Ms. Kyle.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I'm afraid I wasn't much help after all.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Well, at least now I know what their cover story is.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You know, it's awfully late for lunch.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Would you mind if I took a rain check on our date?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: That'll give me time to take care of some business tonight.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Actually, I plan to work late myself.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And so, boys, we gotta increase our cut in the gambling operations.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Anybody got a problem with that?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Back off, boys.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I want a word with your boss, but you can listen.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What do you want?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: What do you know about Red Claw?

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Why you asking us? We're no terrorists.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: You're still scum, and you hear things I don't.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I want Red Claw.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: And until I get him, I'm going to lean extra hard on you

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: and all the other mob bosses.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: If you think I've been bad news before...

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: I-I get the picture. I'll see what I can do.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: If Stern won't admit what's going on,

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: we'll have to find out for ourselves.

media_file: Batman The Animated Series (1992) - S01E01 - The Cat & the Claw (Part 1) (1080p BluRay x265 RCVR).mkv
text: Despite our loss of arms, thanks to Batman's interference,
