media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And we lose.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That's for sure. She's got a point there.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's the matter with you guys?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Where is your confidence?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Have faith that this year will be different.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We've done our homework. We know their strengths.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And we know their weaknesses.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: By sundown tomorrow,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I guarantee we'll be raising another pennant up on that flagpole.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But only if you believe.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Are you with me?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yay! Hooray!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Come on, team.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Go, go, go! Let's hit that field.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You've got to be kidding me.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is ridiculous.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Seriously? -What is she doing?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hello, big brother.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can you move, please?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You're sort of in the way.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's fully in the way.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -You said it, Franklin. -Yeah.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Uh-huh. -That's right.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is a travesty.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Isn't this the most beautiful flower you've ever seen?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Flower? It's a dandelion.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Dandelions are weeds, Sally.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't call her that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You're going to hurt her feelings.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's a beautiful little flower, and she deserves to be admired.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's also on the pitcher's mound.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's going to be trampled.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm not going to let that happen.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's my friend, and I made a promise to protect her.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I thought you said we had to practice.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yeah. Let's get this show on the road!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Settle down, everyone.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'll handle this.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally, I'll bet you didn't know Mom made your favorite cookies this morning.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Maybe if you hurry home, she'll give you one.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I will not be manipulated.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Perhaps you should try a different approach.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Such as? -The Socratic method.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's a form of argumentative dialogue based on asking and answering questions

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: to stimulate critical thinking.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Socratic what?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Begging might also work.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: please move!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We've got to practice for tomorrow's game.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm not moving.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is just great.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Now we're for sure not going to win that pennant!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is a minor setback.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No big deal.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I know my little sister.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She'll get bored and go home soon.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Until then, we can practice around her.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Everyone, take your positions.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Once in a golden hour

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I cast to earth a seed.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Up there came a flower,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The people said, a weed."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Mine, mine!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Strike three!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally? I know we had our differences, but look.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I brought you some of Mom's cookies.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She'll be back.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That lumpy old mound can't be very comfortable.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: By morning, everything will be back to normal.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Wish me luck, Joe.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Charlie Brown! Charlie Brown! Charlie Brown!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Charlie Brown! Charlie Brown! Charlie Brown!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Charlie… Brown?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Good morning, big brother.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally, what in the world are you doing?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You can't keep sitting on the pitcher's mound forever.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yes, I can!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I made a promise, and I'm not going to break it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can't you see?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This flower needs me.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But today's the championship game.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't you have any idea what's at stake here?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And it's not your game.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's important is this little flower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But it's not a flower. It's a weed.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't believe it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's still here!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What happened to, "I know my little sister"?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: When has Charlie Brown ever done anything right?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Big brother, can you take this conversation elsewhere?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All this conflict is making my flower nervous.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All right, everyone.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Just give me some time to think.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank you for opening up before the game today, Lucy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm in desperate need of some help.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You've come to the right place then, Charlie Brown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: There's no one more qualified to solve your problems than me.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Let me pull your file.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Actually, it's about Sally.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She still won't move from the pitcher's mound,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and today's the championship game.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I thought maybe you could talk to her.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't normally make field calls.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is going to cost you an extra five cents.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Would you take three cents and a butterscotch?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'll do it!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't understand what Sally is trying to prove.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's just one small, insignificant weed.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't worry, Charlie Brown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'll handle this.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lucy's very convincing.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm sure this is going to work.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It is. It's working.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally's standing.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Any second now she's going to move.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's sitting!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't sit down!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Now Lucy's sitting too?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You're not supposed to be sitting!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You're supposed to be moving!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I demand a refund.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't worry, little flower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Charlie Brown is just here to say hello.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We won't let him hurt you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We? Who's we?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What about the game?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We can't play now.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't you see, Charlie Brown?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally is a lone spirit, standing up for her beliefs in the face of adversity.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's strong. She's powerful. She's inspiring.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Come to think of it, you know who she reminds me of, Charlie Brown?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She reminds me of…

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I think I made a big mistake.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Attention, fellow citizens.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally Brown is taking a stand to save a poor, defenseless flower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She has a message that must be heard.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She has a voice that won't be silenced.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Did you hear what Sally Brown is doing?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I heard she sat outside all night to protect the flower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I never knew she was such a rebel. And she's in my class.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Must be a pretty special flower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -You going? -I'll bring a plate of hamburger snacks.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Meet you there. And spread the word!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What she doesn't have is you!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That's right, she needs your help.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: After all, flowers can't protect themselves, can they?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So be like Sally, take a stand!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Join us for the sit-in on the mound.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Tell your friends, spread the word!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Exercise your First Amendment rights!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What in the world is this?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You were supposed to get rid of your sister.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yeah! Not bring back reinforcements!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's the plan now, Coach?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: How are you doing, little flower?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I wish I brought my radio.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I hear flowers really like music.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I could help you with that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Oh, Schroeder!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We could use your help over here!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Flowers just love classical music.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What about the game?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Baseball games come and go, Charlie Brown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But a receptive audience is something I simply cannot turn down.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Wow, little flower. Look at all your new friends.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You'll never be lonely again.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can you believe it?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: On a field like this, Sally found something beautiful to care about.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I wanna know what it feels like

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: to care about something as much as Sally cares about that flower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey! Where are you going?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Wait, let's not make any hasty decisions.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What about the neighborhood pennant?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What about the bragging rights?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What about my championship?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: At least you're still with me.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Aren't you, Snoopy?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Not you, too!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Good grief. What's next?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This has really gotten out of control.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Doesn't anyone care about the championship game anymore?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can you hear that?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No, no, you've got to listen closer

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: A dandelion speaks

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't laugh She's got some things to teach us

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's the small things Like us

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We come together to make big things

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Like a baseball game

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's not just one

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's everyone

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And to be fair

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We don't own this ground Charlie Brown

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We share it

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So whoa up! Slow down

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: There's life on the mound

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can you hear the sound?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's the small things, Charlie Brown

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can't you see yourself? Right there

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That's you, alone You're a lonely flower

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But a field of us, you know

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We make a team and that's our power

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So be aware

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Of where you step

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And what and who You might be stepping on

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Look up Look now

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So huge So wow

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Let me break it down

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Little droplets make big clouds

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's the small things, Charlie Brown

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lots and lots Of the tiniest dots

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can make shapes Even faces when viewed far away

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And the quietest voice

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Could cut through the noise

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: When it's speaking

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Look up Look down

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The sky and the ground Getting louder now

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The voice of the bravest flower

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Too small to hear without

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Some perspective, Charlie Brown

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Do the right thing Are you with me, Charlie Brown?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: How could this get any worse?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey, Chuck, ol' boy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Ready for the big game?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Ready to slug it out for nine long innings?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Ready to see which team will reign supreme?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's with the party? I thought we were playing ball.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I see what's going on here.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The old infield sit-in maneuver.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Nice try, Chuck, but it's not going to work.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You got your own sister to camp out on the mound

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: so we can't clobber you at the plate?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You think if we can't play, then you can't lose?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Is that it, Chuck?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No. I want to play.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's just that this dandelion seems to mean a lot to a lot of people.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Especially my little sister.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I get it. The old dandelion excuse.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Heard it a million times, Chuck.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We'll just mark this game down as a loss for you, due to a forfeit.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Yes! -Champions again!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What kind of manager can't even keep his team together?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't listen to them, Chuck.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We all know how tough a five-year-old can be.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Little sisters always win against their big brothers.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And hey, remember, there's always next year.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Charlie Brown! Charlie Brown! Charlie Brown!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hold it right there.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This game isn't over yet.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't need to get everyone to leave.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I just need the dandelion to leave.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And then everyone else will follow.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Out of the way, Sally.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sorry, but this has to be done.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Not a chance, big brother.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I won't let you hurt my flower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally, I'm not going to hurt it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Its.The.Small.Things.Charlie.Brown.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You have to trust me.

text: I've gathered all our school supplies for the new year.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: School supplies?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm not going to need any of that, Linus.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I've just discovered a great secret in the library.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I won't be attending that new school after all.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What are you talking about?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: There's a special test you can take.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If you pass it, they give you your diploma early

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and you never have to return to school again.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -What did she say? -Huh?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And since I already know everything they teach in school,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I bet I can pass that test with my eyes closed.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Who knew such a thing existed?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Why did no one ever tell us about this before?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Is this test for real?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You bet it is.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And when I do pass it, I'm going to have summer vacation all year round.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Now, if you'll excuse me,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I need to be fitted for my graduation gown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lucy, wait up!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Wait up a minute! -Come on, please!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yes? Can I help you?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's all this talk about not going back to school?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Are you really gonna have an endless summer?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can you imagine? An endless summer.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I could play piano all day. Every day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I could have more time to practice my curveball.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Practice all you want, Chuck. I'll still clobber you at the plate.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey, Lucille.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Since you're so sure you can pass that test,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: you think you could teach us so we could pass it too?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You want me to help you pass the test?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't know. I'm pretty busy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lucy. Please.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What has gotten into everyone?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Marcie, I'm surprised to see you're going along with this.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I can see how you may doubt your sister, Linus.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But if we do get our diplomas early, it sure would be nice

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: to get a jump-start on my college applications.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What about you, Franklin?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Morbid curiosity.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Please, Lucy! Wait up.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Slow down. -We want it to be summer forever.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Of course, I'll help you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It would be boring to be the only kid in the neighborhood

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: that doesn't have to go to school anymore.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You know dogs aren't allowed in school.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What makes you think you can join my class?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: My school, my rules. Consider yourself enrolled.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lucy, do you really think you can be a teacher?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Teachers are fair, they're diplomatic, they're patient.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And most important, they have a wealth of knowledge.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You can't teach what you don't know.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All right, listen up. The test date is in a few days.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Stick with me and you'll have summer vacation all year long.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Van Pelt Academy begins tomorrow morning.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This isn't going to end well.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Good morning, class. -Good morning, Lucy!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Wait, this doesn't look like a classroom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Patty's right. Where are the desks?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And the chalkboard?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You can't have a school without a chalkboard.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't need any of that stuff to teach. I have everything I need right here.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hello, Linus. I see you decided to join us.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hardly. I'm here to stop you from making a fool of yourself.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Why are you even so adamant on passing this test?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We want it to be summer forever!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sit down, Linus.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yeah. Don't ruin this for the rest of us.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You heard them. Take a seat and join the class.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All right, class. Let's get started.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Science. A cornerstone of education.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Just think of where we would be without it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No lights, no refrigerators, no commercially available dog food.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: However, today we are studying my favorite invention, the television.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: How does it work? No one really knows. That's science for you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Isn't it her job to know? She is the teacher.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Television is full of informative and educational programming

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: on topics ranging from law enforcement,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: to medicine, to which detergent will get your sheets the cleanest.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But if you're looking for a show to teach you all about science…

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That's Mr. Spock. Listen closely to him. He's a scientist.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey, teacher. Are there really aliens in outer space?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: They just landed on a planet full of them, didn't they?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's time to focus on math. Specifically, numbers.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Suddenly, I have a feeling of impending doom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't worry. This will be easy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Today, I'm going to teach you the type of math

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: you'll actually put to use in the real world.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: B9. The first number is B9.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That Lucy is one great teacher.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I know! Who would have thought?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I never knew learning could be so much fun.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's like we're not even doing math.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You can say that again.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Excuse me, ma'am. There's no way the test is going to cover--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Marcie, if you don't mind,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: this is a place of learning, not interrupting.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Now, where was I? Oh, yes. I17!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Next, we come to geography!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Welcome to bonny ol' England,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and the world's most famous clock, Big Ben.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: For something called Big Ben, it's not that big.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's not the real one, Sir. We're at a mini-putt.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Here in England, the president is called the Queen.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: England is mainly known for the Beatles invasion of the 1960s.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Those pesky bugs spread to America and destroyed our country's crops.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Boy, you really know your stuff, Lucy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I told you this teaching stuff was a piece of cake.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's easy when you make it all up.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Here we are at the Atlantic Ocean,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: where the fearless Amelia Earhart became the first female aviator

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: to fly solo across these mighty waters in 1932.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She did that? Is that really true, Marcie?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It sure is, Sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's also the first true thing that Lucille has taught so far.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's probably because she read it right here on the pedestal.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Excuse us. I'm trying to teach here.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Oh, yeah? Teach this, lady.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Uh-oh! It looks like we've overstayed our travel visas!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, that's it for today.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If we keep this up, we'll have no problem passing that test.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank you. No applause necessary.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: When you know as much as I do, teaching is a breeze.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We'll pick it up again tomorrow.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And remember, no homework!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What kind of school is this?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I have to admit, I prefer a classroom with a stronger emphasis on facts.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lucy must be stopped.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No one is going to pass that test with what Lucy is teaching us.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't think she's teaching us anything! I got an A in bingo today.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I keep asking myself, "What would Miss Othmar do?"

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Miss Othmar…

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I can't help but feel like we just missed something.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: A great day deserves a great reward.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank you Miss Othmar for getting me this test.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You don't understand the risk I took reaching out to you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If my sister knew we were talking--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Miss Othmar? Hello?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Listen, Lucy. You're fooling yourself if you think

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: your class will pass this test.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You can't cram nine years of education into one week.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This isn't you, Lucy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's bothering you?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's bothering me is you going behind my back to Miss Othmar.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What is this?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't understand any of it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is a practice test.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Just like the one you'll be taking in a few days.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But this can't be the test.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I haven't been teaching any of this. I don't know any of this stuff.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Of course you don't. That's why we go to school. To learn.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm talking about trigonometry, world history, cartography.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Human anatomy, biochemistry, macroeconomics, astronomy,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: microbiology, quantum physics, the scientific method.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm not going to pass. Going to have to go to the new school.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Come with us, Lucy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Looks like we won't have summer forever.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm not going to that--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I mean, let me take another look at this test.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lucy, you have to give it up.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You need to let everyone know that this absurd dream

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: of an endless summer is not going to happen.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No! I made everyone a promise.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If this is what it takes to pass the test, then I'm going to learn all of it

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and teach it too.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: After all, I'm a teacher.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You are not a teacher!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is a fool's errand! Mark my words!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So much for diplomacy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All right. If we're going to get serious about passing that test,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: we're going to need a proper classroom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lookin' good, teach.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We're gonna need more supplies.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: There goes my retirement fund.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey, Lucy. Why don't you come to the movies with us?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Maybe next time. I've got a lot of work to do.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The library's gonna close soon. I better get moving.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: 11,842 lakes.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Gladys West's work contributed to the creation

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: of the global positioning system, also known as GPS.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Important to remember that subordinate verbs are placed before the main verb.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: what is the value of x and y if y is a prime number?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't know how teachers put themselves through this

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: year after year.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What are we gonna do today, teacher?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -I think we should go on a nature walk. -How about a nature swim?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's going on here?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Why are there desks in here? And books?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This feels like a real classroom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I dunno what you did, Linus, but whatever it was, it worked.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Okay. Listen up, class.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: May I have your attention, please?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Quiet, please.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This test is a few days away and we have a lot to cover.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You still want an endless summer, don't you?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Oh, yeah. -Of course.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Okay, let's see. Take out your algebra books, please.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Evaluating the expressions of two variables."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Wait, I think I wrote some notes on this one.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This made a lot more sense last night.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You know what, on second thought, take out your science books instead.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "The periodic table arranges the chemical elements

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: according to their properties.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Group one consists of lithium, sodium, potatoium."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I think you mean "potassium"?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That's what I said. The next one is ruby-- ruby--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's pronounced "rubidium."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Is that going to be on the test?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Why don't we do history instead?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Everyone open your history books, please.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank heavens, the Mayflower.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Let's see. In 1492, Columbus sailed the ocean blue?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Excuse me, Lucy? That's not what it says in our book.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Of course, it doesn't.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I was just trying to see if you were paying attention.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "In 1620, the Mayflower set sail from England,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: looking for freedom in the New World.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The trip across the sea was difficult.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Poor planning and miscalculations soon revealed to them

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: that they didn't know as much as they thought they did.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If the crew had been less experienced, the voyage would have ended in failure."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I can't do this anymore. I'm not a real teacher.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't know it all.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We're never going to pass that test.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: There won't be an endless summer.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's over. I'm sorry I let you all down.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Class dismissed.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, it was a nice dream while it lasted.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I can't believe we wasted our last week of summer on this.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Let's get out of here.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I was wondering, will I still be getting an A

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: on my permanent record?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Say no more.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I guess we'll see you later, Linus.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm proud of you, Lucy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It takes a lot of courage to admit when you're in over your head.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Something has been on my mind.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You've always loved going to school.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So why have you been working so hard to graduate early?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm afraid to go to that new school.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You? Afraid? That's not the Lucy I know.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Everything is going to change.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Do you wanna know a secret?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm afraid too.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Just remember something, Lucy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: On that first day of school, when we get off that bus,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'll be right there by your side.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank you, Linus.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I just don't know if I'm ready.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Being a teacher is hard work.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm exhausted.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's the first day of school.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Good morning.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: -Like the hairdo. -Are you ready for school?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I slept in!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey, Charlie Brown? Your shirt is on backwards.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I've decided that this year,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I am no longer going to put expectations on myself.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: With great expectations comes failure.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So naturally, without any expectations comes--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Success! I like that, Charlie Brown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I like that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I can't wait to check out the band room.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Did you know they have their own Steinway D concert piano?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I was so excited last night that I did some preemptive extra credit.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Behold, the Step Pyramid of Djoser made entirely of sugar cubes.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey, Lucille.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I looked up more about that Amelia Earhart lady.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Did you know when she was a child,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: she said she could do anything a boy could do, and she did.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's the kind of person I want to be

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and she reminds me of the kind of person you are.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Oh, yeah? What kind of person is that?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Fearless! You've always been one to blaze your own path,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: to never back down from a challenge.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I can't wait to find out who else I'm going to learn about.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This year I'm definitely staying awake.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, what are you all waiting for?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You don't want to be late for the first day of school, do you?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You said you'd be right there by my side.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What I did over summer vacation, by Lucy Van Pelt.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: My summer wasn't just about going to the beach

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: or catching fireflies in a jar

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: or playing outside until the sun went down.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It was much more than that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Perhaps the most important thing I did this summer was learn

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: just how special teachers really are.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Change can be pretty scary when you're growing up,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: but that's where teachers come in.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: They're here to help us move past our fears,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: so that we may chase our dreams.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Teachers do more than just read a lot of books and know a lot of facts.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: They give every piece of themselves to inspire us to be better.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: A teacher is a friend, a mentor, a role model.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: They help us when we're down. When we're afraid.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Teachers change lives in ways that will travel with us

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: far beyond these classroom walls, into our hearts, into our minds,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and into our future.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So I want to thank you, Miss Halverson. Thank you for being a teacher.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We students might not always give you teachers enough appreciation,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: but in my eyes, you're all heroes.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I just wanted you to know that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey! Have some respect!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I hope you know what you're getting yourself into with this bunch.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.Lucys.School.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Hey, Snoopy. It's page 34.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Downloaded from YTS.MX

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Official YIFY movies site: YTS.MX

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Come on, Sally. I can't be late. I'm the one who scheduled this practice.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Right behind you, big brother.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Good morning, Charlie Brown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Good morning, Linus, Lucy. Are you ready for today's practice?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Why do we even bother with practice? We never win any games.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That's exactly why. I'm tired of losing.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Look at it this way, Charlie Brown,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: we learn more from losing than we do from winning.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
