text: That must make me the smartest person in the world.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Aren't you going to say good morning to me, my Sweet Babboo?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm not your Sweet Babboo!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What's the plan, Charlie Brown?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: New uniforms? New playbook? A new quarterback?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No, a new coach.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Maybe you're not such a blockhead after all.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Good morning, sir. - Good morning, Marcie.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I've been reading up on football.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm ready to get out there and kick around the old hogskin.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's pigskin, Marcie. And everything isn't "old" in football.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Whatever you say, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And don't call me "sir." Today it's "Coach."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All right, listen up.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Chuck here has asked me to help his team get in shape for next season.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Nothing like a good challenge.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Ready to get to work? Good.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I like to start my warm-ups with 100 jumping jacks.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You heard her. Jump!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: One, two, three,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Sorry I'm late, Coach. - Hope you have a good excuse, Pigpen.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I do. The line at the candy store sure was backed up due to Mother's Day tomorrow.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That's tomorrow? I can't believe I almost forgot Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Mother's Day? Mother's Day is special.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Cut the chitchat, Chuck.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Marcie, where were we?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I lost count.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Time for a little demonstration. What you're about to see

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: is some real down-in-the-dirt, slam-bang, rock-'em-sock-'em football.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Marcie, bring 'em in.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Keep your eyes on the kid with the funny nose.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Look at those moves.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Okay, kid. Enough with the moves.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Let's start with a simple kick.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All right, tee it up!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Nice hit, little guy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Shake it off. Forget the kick. Let's do the passing play.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I never know what my mother would like. You're clever, Linus. What are you doing?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, every day my mom puts these little notes in my lunch sack,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: just like this one.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Dear Son, study hard.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Remember, all you need to find true happiness

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: is already there within you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The lunch is just a bonus. Love, Mom."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She gets carried away sometimes.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Now go straight out and cut right.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Now left. Now cut back.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't come back. It's a pass, not a return.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This year, I decided to write a special letter back to thank her.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Unfortunately, I still need to figure out what to say.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Writing is not really my strong suit.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Roses are-- Violets are"--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This isn't the play! Tackle that guy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can he even hear me?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What are you guys doing?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm making Mom a gift that will be a true artistic masterpiece.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Really? What's that?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If I knew, I'd tell you!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - What are you getting your mom? - She's been really nice lately,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: so I upped her gift to a crisp five-dollar bill.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: How thoughtful of you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Cold, hard cash.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You don't have the ball.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm writing a sonata for my mom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I call it, "You're the Best Mom," in F major.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: My mom loves hugs,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: so I'm making her a coupon book full of them.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Stop! Look behind you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Not bad for a little guy. Run! Go, go go!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Not pretty, but it's a touchdown!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Did you get all… that?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Mother's Day. - Happy Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Isn't Mother's Day the best?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Happy Mother's Day. - I love Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: May I have your attention?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Unless you all have something better you'd rather be doing?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Actually, I need to go to the craft store for art supplies.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I need to make more coupons.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I still have to work on the last movement of my sonata.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: A card would go nicely with my box of chocolates.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I should be writing my letter.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sorry, Coach. I should go too.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'll call you to set up another practice soon.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All right, go ahead and leave.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But don't blame me when you lose next season.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: At least someone isn't distracted by stupid Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You too? Everyone deserted me.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Not everyone, Coach. Sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Now, here's the sneaky part.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I turn back and do a fake-o pass to the running back.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But then I keep the ball to myself,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: do a few tricky moves to avoid the other side,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and run down the field for a touchdown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is all very interesting, sir,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: but maybe we should do this when the other players are here.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No. I refuse to change my plans just because of Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Maybe we could find something else that's fun to do.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Who says I'm not having fun?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Is this the face of a person not having fun?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Do you want to talk about it, sir? - No.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sir, I'm really sorry you don't have a mom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I just don't understand why Mother's Day's such a big deal.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Mother's Day is… dumb!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's nice that we've opened up this line of communication, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You should just go home, Marcie.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm sure you have some things you need to prepare for tomorrow.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Taken care of, sir. I made cupcakes.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I would rather stay here with you.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's the same every year.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm having a good day, and then someone brings up Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And suddenly I'm reminded that I'm the only kid who doesn't have a mom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It must be difficult, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It really is, Marcie.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Last year, I pretended to be sick

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: so I didn't have to go to school that week.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I remember. You came down with a case of the yuckies.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If you want, you can spend Mother's Day at my house.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't mind sharing my mom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Your mom's nice, but it's just not the same.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Is there anything I can do to help?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't know, Marcie.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can you make Mother's Day go away and never come back again?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm afraid not, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I didn't think so.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Let's go return Chuck's football.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "To my mom." No.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Mommy dearest." No.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "O mother of mine."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Hey, Mom."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Letter writing is a lost art.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Move over, Linus.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I need the table to make my special Mother's Day present.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's going to be a portrait of Mom done in watercolor.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: She's going to take one look at it and say,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "That picture belongs at the top of the fridge."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sounds like a great idea.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I believe the best gifts come from the heart.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Heart, schmeart. This is art.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Being a great artist means having discipline, concentration,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and never rushing your masterpiece.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Have you looked at Mom recently?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I think I'll make something else. Something inspired.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: There's a fine line between honest and too honest.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Aren't you going to ring the doorbell?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't want to see anybody.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Do you want to borrow my handkerchief?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm not crying, I'm thinking.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: They sort of look like the same thing sometimes.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, it's here if you want it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't know why I get so upset.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Maybe because you miss your mom?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I never had a mom. How could I miss her?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, maybe you miss what moms do,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: like making your favorite cookies

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and putting a bandage on your finger when you have a cut

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and singing your favorite song?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't miss those things.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: My dad does all that mom stuff for me. He's the best.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Your dad is very nice.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Are you okay, sir?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Marcie, there are all types of moms, right?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Of course. Foster kids have terrific moms.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So do adopted kids. Some kids even have two moms.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Right. And even kids like me, with no mom, can have someone who acts like a mom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And all those moms deserve to be celebrated, don't you think?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sure they do.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, that's what I'm gonna do.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: For Mother's Day, I'm going to celebrate my dad.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's so simple.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All I have to do is get him one of those Mother's Day gifts.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Like a card?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yes, that's it! A card!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I get him a card. And bang! No more yuckies. Problem solved.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Marcie, you're a genius!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I can't believe it's already Mother's Day tomorrow.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Wasn't it just Mother's Day last year?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It happens every year.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But stay focused, Sally. We need to think of a special gift.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally, I think I have a plan.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What does Mom always say is her favorite meal?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: The one she doesn't have to cook.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, tomorrow we're going to make her breakfast in bed.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Won't that make her sheets soggy?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't think you understand the finer details of breakfast in bed.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's served on a tray, and it's very classy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It sounds messy to me.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Trust me, she's going to love it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But we should do a test run first.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Bring me the good plates from the china cabinet.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Aye, aye, big brother.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I thought you said breakfast in bed wasn't messy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Good grief.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We have arrived. All right.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We're looking for a Mother's Day card that says,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Thanks, Dad, for being such a good mother."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That sounds… logical.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Dear Mother, your smile brightens my day." No.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Dear Mother, my love for you"--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "To a mother sweeter than sugar." Not that one either.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Where are the Mother's Day cards he'd like?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Some trucks or sports or a little bit of flannel?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: These are all flowery and mushy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Mother, O Mother!" Oh, brother.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No. Never. Nope.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't believe it. There's nothing here for my dad.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Have you seen any cards that say,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Happy Mother's Day to the world's greatest grandma"?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I want one that's short and sweet, just like her.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Good luck with that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "There is no other like my grandmother.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Happy Mother's Day to the world's greatest grandma."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is perfect.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank you. Marcie.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Can you show me where I can find a Mother's Day card for my father?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, you should expand your card selection.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Not everyone has the same sort of family, you know. Sheesh.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I refuse to give up.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: What about ice skates?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: He has weak ankles.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - What about flowers? - He has allergies.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Some jewelry? - Nice, but too expensive.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: How about a cake?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: He's more of a salty kind of guy.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: A day of pampering?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: He hates cucumber.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Write him a song?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I give up. This is impossible.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't you think cleaning up the kitchen counts as a gift?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We're running out of time. Let's keep looking.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: How about an ice cream cake?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Actually, that's not a bad idea.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: One ice cream cake, please.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Strawberry. - Strawberry.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Large. - Large, please.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sally, I'm a little short. Do you have any money?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: From one mess to another.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You know, Mother's Day is just another commercial scam.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank you, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Should I assume you won't be eating any of this commercial scam?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Of course I will.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: When ice cream is involved, my principles are totally negotiable.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I suppose you're wondering where I got this beautiful crown.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It certainly crossed my mind.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I made it to give to my mom tomorrow,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: so she can feel what it's like to be queen for a day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm testing it out, and it feels very good.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm never going to find something for my da--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Mother's Day, Mother's Day… Everywhere I go, that's all I hear.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I think if I hear "Mother's Day" one more time, I'll-- I'll scream.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We got my mom an ice cream cake for Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I was going to get her a vanilla cake or a chocolate cake for Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But Sally suggested strawberry.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And that seemed like the perfect flavor for Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Mother's Day. Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's ruined! Look what you did!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sorry, Lucille.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Chuck. It's just--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: No time to explain.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Sir, come back.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Apparently Mother's Day is not her favorite holiday.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Sir? Where are you going? - Home.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All I wanted to do was get my dad a Mother's Day gift. I couldn't do that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - Maybe we can-- - No, Marcie.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Whatever you're going to say, I don't want to hear it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Every time you try to help, I end up feeling worse.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I'm sorry, sir. That was never my intention.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Mother's Day has always been bad for me, and that's never going to change.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: So please, leave me alone.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I bet ants don't have to celebrate Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Lucky ants.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Ants are lucky, I suppose.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: They always seem to know where they fit in.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Every now and then, my dad says to me,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Peppermint Patty, do you know what you are?"

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And I always say no.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Then he says to me, "You are a rare gem." And then we laugh about it.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But sometimes I wish I wasn't so rare.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I think I understand.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Today everyone was so excited. More than excited.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: They were happy about celebrating their moms.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And I knew, no matter what I do, I'll never know how that feels.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And I was angry.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Have you ever thought maybe your anger is really sadness?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's okay to cry, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: One tear isn't crying.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Maybe you could get your dad something else.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Don't start that again.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I was thinking, sir, we tried the usual things.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: But you are rare.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Is there something you could give him that could only come from you?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I don't know.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, what are your favorite things to do together?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Everything.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We play baseball. He taught me all I know about football.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We like to tell each other dumb jokes. The dumber they are, the more we laugh.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: He loves to hear me laugh. He says it reminds him of my mom.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I know how to celebrate Mother's Day.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Tomorrow I'll spend the whole day with my dad.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: We'll play and talk to each other, and I'm gonna make him laugh.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And he'll make me laugh.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And together we'll share the biggest laugh ever.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: That sounds like the best Mother's Day gift a father has ever had.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Yeah! It does! I gotta go!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Marcie, if I said anything before to hurt your feelings, I'm sorry.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - You're a true friend. - You are too, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: And wish your mom a happy Mother's Day for me!

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Will do, sir.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: This is good. But is it top-of-the-fridge good?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It's definitely top-of-the-fridge quality.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Thank goodness.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I was starting to think I had a self-doubt.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: - But it's still missing something. - What? But you just said--

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: All cards need a message inside. It's a rule.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Okay, wise guy. What does your letter say?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Linus. It's-- It's everything I wish I could say.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Well, you know, my letter needs something to go in.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: If you want, we can put it inside your card

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: and give them both to Mom together.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You'd do that?

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: It just needs one little change here.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "Dear Mom, I'm writing you this letter to thank you

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: for the notes you put in my school lunches.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Also, to thank you for my school lunches, especially the bologna sandwiches,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: not so much the tuna fish."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "This is my way of thanking you for all the things you do for me.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: When I'm scared, you give me cuddles and act so sweet.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: When I'm lonely, you call me your 'forever best friend.'

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: I like that.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You always find the time to listen to my new ideas."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: "You give me lots hugs and kisses, even in front of my friends,

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: which is sometimes embarrassing, but I still like them.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: When I make mistakes, you encourage me to try again and again.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You make sure I'm safe every night.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: You give me your best in your own special way."

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Go long, Dad.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4
text: Nice catch.

media_file: Snoopy.Presents.To.Mom.and.Dad.With.Love.2022.1080p.WEBRip.x264.AAC5.1-[YTS.MX].mp4

text: I warned you.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4

text: Twinkle, twinkle, little Spawn.

text: Ha-ha-ha. What, you're not excited yet?

text: Forget Terry.

text: See you at Wanda's. Last one there gets her rotten eggs. Ha-ha-ha.

text: S-U-C-K-I-N-G

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4

text: You still haven't learned.

text: Gotcha, Jason.

text: I can't afford to be wrong.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Still with us, I see.

text: EMT 1: All right, move out of the way. Let's move here.

text: Your vengeance... their pain.

text: Wynn, Wanda, none of this is worth the cost.

text: Al Simmons is dead.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Let him go.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: I am Simmons, old man.

text: EMT 2: Get up there.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4

text: But that doesn't mean you have to be what they want.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: You're still letting them get to you. Your anger is your weakness.

text: And they'll use it to rob you of any humanity you have left.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Your old life is gone. Accept that.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: I still love Wanda.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Put her in the past.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: It's the only way you can be free.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: She's the only reason I'm here.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: The war between heaven and hell depends on the choices we make.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4

text: I didn't know this was gonna happen.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: I'm gonna nail that scumbag.

text: Kiss it goodbye, Clown.

text: This is just what they want. You're playing their game.

text: - Guns are useless. - You got a better idea?

text: so long as you stay clear and focused.

text: Wynn is out of his mind.

text: I'm thirsty.

text: Okay, baby.

text: You want some water?

text: Hey, sweetheart.

text: Some unfinished business.

text: You can't release the virus. Millions of people will die.

text: Whatever it is you want, just take it and go.

text: I intend to.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: It's all right, sweetheart.

text: Peekaboo, I see you. Ha-ha-ha.

text: You know how hard this place is to find in the dark?

text: I smell you're not wearing any panties.

text: Oh, hello, Cyan. Remember me?

text: Booga-booga-booga!

text: You were at my birthday party.

text: No duh. What are you, a regular Einstein? You sure know how to raise them, don't you?

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: - What are you doing? - Don't you touch her.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Back off, hero.

text: I'm back by popular demand.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Big as life and twice as rotten.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Does wonders for my asthma.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Where's Spawn?

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Let's cut the crap.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Spawn's on his way. You ready to play?

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Of course I am.

text: You better be.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: You don't know how much your heart means to me.

text: Come on. Bring them, Jerky.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: - Wanda. - Help me, please.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: WYNN: Uh-uh-uh. Careful.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Don't make me nervous. I might nick something vital.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: - Get away from her. - I can't do that.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: She wants me.

text: You touch her, and you die slow.

text: All right, Spawn. No more fun and games.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Either you join hell's army or she dies.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: - After I'm done. - I will rip your heart out! Let her go!

text: So, what's it gonna be?

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Time is running out.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: - Too late. - Ah!

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: It's all your fault, Spawn.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: She was doing fine till you showed up.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Now you've got nothing left to lose.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: You're a soulless corpse.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: You're wrong.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: I've still got you.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Don't be afraid.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: You can't kill me.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Is that right?

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: If my heart stops, then the virus is released and everybody in the world dies.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Like you said...

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: I've got nothing else to lose.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: That's right. Feel the burn.

media_file: SPAWN - Director's Cut (1997 - 1080p BluRay).mp4
text: Get used to it, because it's payback time.

text: See you in hell, Jason.

text: If you kill me, you kill her!

text: I'm through doing hell's dirty work.

text: You worthless bag of... Ah!

text: How could you let him kill me?

text: You pansy bacon crisp!

text: YOU SHOULD BE DOWN ON YOUR KNEES

text: THANKING ME FOR NOT KILLING YOU WHERE YOU STAND.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, RIGHT.

text: BUT IT'S TIME YOU FOUND OUT.

text: I'VE HAD JUST ABOUT ENOUGH...

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, BABY!

text: - GET OUT OF MY HEAD! - NO.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: YOUR POWERS ARE FINITE. USE THEM SPARINGLY.

text: IF YOU KNOW WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON, OLD MAN,

text: - WHAT WAR? - THE ONLY WAR.

text: EARTH IS THE BATTLEFIELD,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: LOOK, YOU HAVE TO PAY ATTENTION

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO THE WORLD YOU'RE IN.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: I WISH IT WERE THAT EASY.

text: ALL I'M TRYING TO SAY IS

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E02 - Evil Intent (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: YOU'RE SURE

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E03 - No Rest, No Peace (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, RIPPED THEM APART.

text: - CAN I... CAN I GO? - IN A MOMENT.

text: - BORROW SOMETHING. - NO NO NO!

text: IN MOST INSTANCES,

text: THOSE PLACES HAVE A HIDDEN POWER.

text: IN A FAGGY OUTFIT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E03 - No Rest, No Peace (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E03 - No Rest, No Peace (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E03 - No Rest, No Peace (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E03 - No Rest, No Peace (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - GAREB? - YEAH.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CAN I BREATHE NOW?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ANOTHER NIGHTMARE, HUH?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I GET THEM REAL BAD SOMETIMES,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: REMEMBERING WHEN MY FOLKS PUT ME IN THE HOSPITAL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SAID I WAS, YOU KNOW, "TOUCHED IN THE HEAD."

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I THOUGHT SOME DOWNTIME WOULD HELP,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GIVE ME A CHANCE TO SORT THINGS OUT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SEEMS LIKE THE MORE I THINK,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE WORSE THE NIGHTMARES GET,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND I CAN'T SHUT IT OFF.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HUNGRY?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I GOT A GOOD DEAL ON A HALF LOAF OF BREAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - ONLY A WEEK OLD. -

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: STILL GOT SOME OF THE PLASTIC WRAP AROUND IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GO AWAY, GAREB.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU SHOULDN'T SIT DOWN HERE ALONE ALL THE TIME.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT AIN'T HEALTHY.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M NOT WORRIED ABOUT MY HEALTH.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE GOTTA FIGURE THINGS OUT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAYBE YOU NEED TO QUIT ALL THIS FIGURING

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND JUST DO SOMETHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF COURSE, WHAT DO I KNOW, RIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M JUST A BUM

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WITH HALF A LOAF OF MOLDY BREAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NOBODY TO SHARE IT WITH, EXCEPT MY BUDDIES

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JACK DANIEL'S AND JIM BEAM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAVE A FRIEND THERE, SPAWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LISTEN TO HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BEAT IT, OLD MAN. I'M IN NO MOOD.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: MOMENTS OF WISDOM ARE FEW FOR THE NEW WARRIORS.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY COME FROM UNEXPECTED SOURCES.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT ALWAYS,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WARRIORS FEEL EVENTS CHURNING AROUND THEM...

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SPIRALING, CLOSING IN.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOME SIT AND WAIT TOO LONG.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OTHERS LISTEN TO THEIR INSTINCTS.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E04 - Dominoes (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND PREPARE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WOULD YOU KNOW THE DEVIL IF YOU SAW HIM?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WOULD YOU KNOW HIS FACE, HIS EYES?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WOULD YOU FEEL CHILLED IN HIS PRESENCE,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR DO YOU THINK HE'S SOME NAKED RED GUY

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WITH HORNS AND A GOATEE AND A TAIL?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M TODD McFARLANE, CREATOR OF "SPAWN."

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TRUE EVIL IS NEVER WHAT OR WHO YOU EXPECT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMETIMES IT'S GROTESQUE. SOMETIMES IT'S BEAUTIFUL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMETIMES IT'S A MOBSTER OR A PRIEST,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EVEN THE ICE CREAM MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR ALL YOU KNOW, I COULD BE TRUE EVIL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SCARY, HUH?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MOST OF ALL, TRUE EVIL WHISPERS WHAT WE WANNA HEAR,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND WHEN IT SHOWS ITS UGLY FACE,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT TELLS US TO DO NOTHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND THAT'S WHERE WE FIND SPAWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SITTING IN THE SHADOWS DOING ABSOLUTELY NOTHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT YOU GOT THERE IS BIG...

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN A LATENT PRINT OFF THE GIRL'S EYEBALL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: KYLE WATSON WAS SET UP TO TAKE THE FALL FOR THOSE CHILD MURDERS.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS SON OF A BITCH WAS PURPOSELY MISFILED,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: VAULTED AND BURIED.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY ARE YOU FOLLOWING HER?!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANT ANSWERS, NOW!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WEIRD... A GUY FALLS OUT OF A TREE,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEN BLOWS HIS BRAINS OUT. FOR WHAT?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS PHOTOGRAPHER'S FROM WASHINGTON D.C.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR THE U.S. GOVERNMENT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE LOST A RATHER LARGE NUMBER OF WEAPONS

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FROM THAT ORDNANCE ANNEX A WEEK AGO.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO COULD'VE DONE THIS?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT MAY HAVE BEEN AN INSIDE JOB, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S ALL HERE IN MY REPORT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GODDAMN BOY SCOUT!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE LAST THING I NEED IS HIM TURNING HEADS

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BY TALKING TO SOMEONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE GOT SOME HEAVY-DUTY SHIT HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND I NEED THAT DISK.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GONNA TRY TO ACCESS THE GOVERNMENT'S DATABASE

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND BREAK INTO THEIR SYSTEM TO FIND OUT WHO FRAMED WATSON.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMEONE WITH POWER IS PROTECTING A CHILD KILLER.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I NEED TO FIND OUT WHO!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND NOW, "SPAWN." SO TURN OFF YOUR LIGHTS.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: WARRIORS CAN FEEL FORCES MASSING AGAINST THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE AGONIZING WAIT FOR BATTLE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BECOMES A WAY OF LIFE,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TURNING AND TWISTING THEIR DARK SOULS,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FEEDING INTENSE RAGE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT BOILS DEEP IN EVERY HELL SPAWN...

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A RAGE AT THE UNFAIRNESS OF THEIR PLIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND A FEELING STILL DEEPER...

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT THEY'VE EARNED IT.

text: Dispatcher: All units respond to kidnap,

text: - Man: WHO IS THIS FREAK? - Man #2: WITNESSES FIGURE HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: THIS GUY'S NUTS.

text: I HATE THAT!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: 6-Adam-15, come in. 6-Adam-15, come in.

text: I LOVE YOU, WANDA.

text: MAYBE IT'S TIME WE START THINKING ABOUT

text: - - Policeman: FUCKER!

text: HOLY CHRIST!
