media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE DIDN'T ASK FOR HELP.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - HE'S MUTE. - HIS PROBLEM, NOT MINE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LOOK, YOU CAN'T PUSH PEOPLE OUT OF THE WAY,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LOOKING FOR YOUR PERSONAL SPACE,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND EXPECT THEM NOT TO PUSH BACK.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU KILL HIT MEN... THE MOB COMES.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU STICK A COP ON THE WALL... THE POLICE COME.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THESE BUMS, THEY'RE JUST INNOCENT BYSTANDERS,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CAUGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF YOUR STORM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAVE A PURPOSE, SPAWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHETHER YOU WANT TO BELIEVE IT OR NOT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE SOONER YOU ACCEPT IT, THE BETTER OFF YOU'LL BE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I LOVE ICE CREAM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HELLO, BILLY.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW DO YOU KNOW MY NAME?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BEEN ADMIRING YOUR WORK

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR QUITE SOME TIME NOW, ACTUALLY.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I JUST LOVE TO SEE THE CHILDREN'S FACES

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN YOU'RE WITH THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU LIKE KIDS, DON'T YOU, BILLY?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT I'M A CLOWN. I'M SUPPOSED TO.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, YOU WANNA GO TO A PARTY?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LATER TONIGHT, ACROSS TOWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WILL BE A REAL SCREAM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Reporter: The investigation has now officially

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - turned into a full-scale manhunt. -

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Very few details have been released.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: We have confirmation that at least one officer

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: has been killed at this point.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Also just in,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: the Senate has narrowly defeated

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: the Federal Relief Taxation Bill

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: spearheaded by Senator McMillan,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: who received much opposition

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: from both Republicans and Democrats.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: McMillan, who plans to run

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: in the next presidential election,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: has been unavailable for comment.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Wanda: READY, CYAN?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GREAT CATCH, HONEY!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - GOOD JOB! - I GOT IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COME ON, HONEY. MOMMY HAS TO GO INSIDE FOR A MINUTE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, THIS IS SHE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, I KNOW MAX KIVALA.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH GOD, NO. NOT MAX!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, HE WORKED FOR ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN DID THIS HAPPEN?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO, YOU DO NOT HAVE A RIGHT TO KNOW

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WHAT WE WERE WORKING ON. -

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - HIS WIFE? YES, I KNOW HER. -

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANT TO HEAR THAT FROM HER.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T TRUST... CYAN?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CYAN, WHERE ARE YOU, HONEY?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: HELLSPAWNS BEGIN TO TAKE SIDES.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN THEIR OWN MINDS:

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: RIGHT, WRONG; MORAL, IMMORAL;

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GOOD, EVIL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NONE ARE EVER SURE WHERE THEY WILL FALL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHATCHA DOING WITH THE HEATERS?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LOTS OF UNFRIENDLY TRAFFIC FLOWING THROUGH HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO THAT'S IT NOW?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S BECOME AN EYE FOR AN EYE?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LISTEN, OLD MAN,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE GOVERNMENT TAUGHT ME

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW TO FIGHT, HOW TO KILL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S ALL I'VE GOT LEFT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU DON'T HAVE THE STOMACH FOR IT,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET THE HELL OUT OF HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Dispatcher: All units,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: report of a child kidnapping on the south side of Queens;

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Female, approximately four years old;

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Answers to the name of Cyan.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Units are rolling... CYAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU KNOW HER?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU GONNA HELP GET THE KID BACK?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke over megaphone: Attention, assholes, this is the police.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Drop all weapons.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Come out with your hands over your heads.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWITCH, I OUGHT TO YANK YOUR DICK OFF.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHERE THE HELL HAVE YOU BEEN?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE GOT THIS COP-KILLING KIDNAPPING BASTARD CORNERED,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND HE AIN'T GETTING AWAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: Hold your fire.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Okay, preacher, just let the boy go,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: and no one has to get hurt here.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, YES, SOMEONE DOES.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S ARMED!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Don't be a fool. Calm down.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: You don't want to do anything stupid.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Just give me the grenade and I promise you

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: that you and the boy will be protected.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S OKAY. STILL GOT A PIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EVERYTHING'S FINE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WELL, NOT QUITE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NOBODY MOVE!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man over radio: Do you have him?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: GOD DAMN IT!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: HOLY SHIT!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - HOLY SHIT, GO! - GO DOWN! EVERYBODY DOWN!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: FINALLY, HAVING CHOSEN A SIDE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND RELEASED OF SOME INNER GUILT,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE WARRIOR IS NOW FREE TO PURSUE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIS PERSONAL MISSION UNFETTERED.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GOD HELP THOSE IN HIS PATH.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Clown: GLAD TO BE OUT OF THAT SKIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OOH, THAT WAS TIGHT,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ESPECIALLY IN THE CROTCH.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MOVE FROM THIS SPOT AND YOU'LL BE SORRY, GIRLIE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HELLO, LITTLE GIRL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E05 - Souls in the Balance (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO YOU LIKE TUTTI-FRUTTI?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO YOU BELIEVE THAT KILLERS SHOULD BE KILLED?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND IF WE KILL THEM,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO WE ADD TO OR REDUCE THE EVIL IN THIS WORLD?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M TODD McFARLANE, CREATOR OF "SPAWN."

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CAN YOU ANSWER THE QUESTION I'VE JUST ASKED?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SPAWN HAS TO.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AS YOU'LL SEE, IT'S TIME FOR A SHOWDOWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND SPAWN STILL HAS SOME BIG CHOICES TO MAKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF HE DECIDES RIGHT,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE BATTLE GOES TO THE GOOD GUYS...

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF HE DECIDES WRONG...

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WELL, YOU KNOW THE ANSWER TO THAT, DON'T YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - Man: WHO IS THIS FREAK? - WITNESSES FIGURE HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR SOME KIND OF WHACKED-OUT STREET PREACHER.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT I NEVER SAID I WAS GONNA KILL ANYBODY.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS SO-CALLED PREACHER

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST MIGHT BE OUR CHILD-KILLER.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Officer: Hold your fire.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - HE'S ARMED! HOLY SHIT! - Woman: OH MY GOD!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: EVERYBODY DOWN!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WYNN, WE'VE GOT A PROBLEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M LISTENING.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE KYLE WATSON SITUATION GOT OUT OF CONTROL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: That lawyer, Wanda Blake?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT MUST BE HER.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Stay calm, run for President.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll TAKE CARE OF THE REST.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Wynn: I need a pick up and delivery... a child.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: HELLO, LITTLE GIRL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO YOU LIKE TUTTI-FRUTTI?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Woman on radio: A report of a child kidnapping;

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: female, approximately four years old;

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: answers to the name Cyan.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND NOW, "SPAWN." SO TURN OFF YOUR LIGHTS.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: YO, MAN, IS IT REAL?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF COURSE IT'S GRADE "A".

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I GOT A REPUTATION TO KEEP.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NOW DO YOU WANT THE SHIT OR NOT?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'LL HAVE TO CHECK WITH THE MAN FIRST.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LISTEN, DUMBSHIT, IF YOU CAN'T MAKE A DECISION YOURSELF

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T WORRY ABOUT COMING BACK.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EAT ME, BALDY.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU KNOW "THE MOUTH"?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GOD DAMN IT, THIS HURTS!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - YEAH, THAT'S ME. - A LITTLE GIRL WAS KIDNAPPED YESTERDAY,

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CYAN FITZGERALD. WHO TOOK HER?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OKAY, MOUTH. SPEAK.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WHO TOOK HER? - OKAY OKAY!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWIST! TONY FUCKIN' TWIST!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CHRIST, WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'RE GONE MAYBE FIVE MINUTES.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DEKE, VINNY!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JESUS FUCKIN' CHRIST!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SON OF A BITCH HAS THE GIRL.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE HAD A DIRTY MOUTH.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND SO DO YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COME ON, HONEY. IT'S TIME TO DANCE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET ME TONY. NOW!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THAT RIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU TELL THE HONORABLE SENATOR FROM BUMFUCK

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANNA BE ABLE TO COUNT ON HIS ENDORSEMENT

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR HE CAN COUNT ON HIS DRUG ADDICTION.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAKING THE FRONT PAGE.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF EVERY MAJOR PAPER IN THE COUNTRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Y'ALL TAKE CARE NOW, YOU HEAR?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHERE THE HELL ARE WE? I SAID THE WALDORF, NOT THE WATERFRONT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY! HEY, GOD DAMN IT!

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR GOD'S SAKE, WHAT NOW?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMETHING IS AMISS, SENATOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMETHING IS NOT RIGHT WITH THE WORLD.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO YOU HAVE ANY IDEA WHAT THAT SOMETHING MIGHT BE?

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MY HEART CAN'T TAKE MUCH MORE

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF THIS CLOAK-AND DAGGER BULLSHIT.

media_file: SPAWN - S01 E06 - End Games (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S YOUR WHOLE PROBLEM: YOU'RE JUST NOT THE TYPE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: GOD DAMN IT!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Clown: SO WHAT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO YOU GAVE HIM PERMISSION.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO HE DIDN'T KNOW. DID HE HAVE TO SCREW HER?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE COULD HAVE BEEN PLATONIC, RIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DID HE HAVE TO SLAM IT TO HER EVERY NIGHT?!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EVERY YEAR I ASK THEM TO KEEP HIS GRAVE BETTER,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND EVERY YEAR THEY LET IT GO TO SEED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TERRY, DON'T LEAVE ME THE WAY HE DID.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PROMISE ME, NO FIELD ASSIGNMENTS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, I WON'T LEAVE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M A DESK JOCKEY, AND I'M PROUD OF IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AL WAS MY BEST FRIEND.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE ONLY ASKED ME TO DO ONE THING FOR HIM...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TAKE CARE OF YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I PROMISED HIM I WOULD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S LYING OVER THERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, BOY SCOUT, YOU MADE THAT FUN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: YOU'RE NOT GONNA DIE ON THIS ROOF.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TAKE CARE OF WANDA UNTIL I COME FOR HER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: THIS TIME THE HELLSPAWN KEPT THE DEMONS AT BAY,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT HE KNOWS THEY WILL ALWAYS RETURN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO TORMENT HIM,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAKING HIM BLIND TO THE TRUTH.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU LET HIM GO. WHY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT DID YOU SAY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN YOU LET HIM GO, YOU TOOK A STEP TOWARD FREEING YOURSELF.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW THE HELL DO YOU KNOW?!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - HOW DO YOU KNOW ANY OF IT?! - I KNOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE NOT THE ONLY ONE TOUCHED BY HIS CURSE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E02 - Access Denied (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: WHO ARE YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: A HELLSPAWN IS RETURNED TO EARTH SOULLESS,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIS MIND RAVAGED, HIS MEMORY SHATTERED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY TOOK EVERYTHING FROM ME!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TERRY, DON'T LEAVE ME THE WAY HE DID.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PROMISE ME NO FIELD ASSIGNMENTS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I THINK I FOUND SOMETHING THEY DIDN'T WANT ME TO FIND.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ONE OF MY OWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY DON'T WE HAVE FITZGERALD SHAKE HANDS WITH MR. RIMERE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY'RE SUCH OLD FRIENDS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAVE A WIFE AND A CHILD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET SOMEONE ELSE TAKE CARE OF IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M ALL ALONE ON THIS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FITZGERALD IS A TRAITOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND HOW DOES OUR AGENCY HANDLE TRAITORS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Woman: SELLING ARMS TO A TERRORIST,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT WAS AN IMPROPER THING TO DO, MR. FITZGERALD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS BULLSHIT!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOLY SHIT. WYNN IS A TRAITOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE NOT GONNA DIE ON THIS ROOF.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TAKE CARE OF WANDA... UNTIL I COME FOR HER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE ALL KNOW THAT WE LIVE IN A WORLD OF HURT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE CAN SEE THE VIOLENCE AND GREED ALL AROUND US.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOME RELY HEAVILY ON FAITH TO COPE WITH THAT,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN THE WORLD'S BREAKING THEIR HEART.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOME RELY ON OTHER ADDICTIONS,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LIKE DRUGS AND COLD HARD CASH.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT WHAT IF THE THINGS THAT WE BELIEVE IN

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ARE THE SAME THINGS THAT CAN DESTROY US?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GOOD, EVIL... WHAT IF WE'RE WRONG ABOUT ALL OF IT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SEE, AL SIMMONS,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE WENT TO HIS GRAVE BELIEVING HE WAS A PATRIOT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE MURDERED FOR HIS COUNTRY AND HIS FLAG.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT IN HIS DREAMS

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE SEES THE DEAD THAT HE CREATED,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND HE REMEMBERS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: IN THE CITY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A RIVER OF HUMANITY RUSHES PAST,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LEAVING BEHIND IN THE ALLEYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE REFUSE,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THOSE THAT BECOME LOST IN THE NIGHT,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE SICK AND THE BROKEN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SPAWN SHARES THIS ALLEY WITH THE LOST SOULS,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO, LIKE HIM,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LONG TO ESCAPE THEIR WOUNDED AND TORMENTED EXISTENCE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DOES HE FEEL ANYTHING AT ALL?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR IS HIS HEART DARK AND EMPTY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WITH NO SHRED OF HUMANITY LEFT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THE HELLSPAWN EVEN AWARE THAT HIS PRESENCE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CAUSES THE DESTRUCTION OF THOSE CLOSEST TO HIM?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THOSE HE HAD HOPED TO PROTECT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: EVERYONE'S IN PLACE, MERRICK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: Wynn's still inside with the wife.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: If Fitzgerald comes home, wait until Wynn walks out

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: and then kill them all.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WANDA, YOU'VE CREATED QUITE A STIR AT THE N.S.C.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T LIKE GETTING THE RUNAROUND.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS HAS BECOME A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION FOR TERRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO KNOWS WHAT HE'S CAPABLE OF DOING?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE NEEDS TO TURN HIMSELF IN, WANDA.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S NOT A CRIMINAL!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU AND I BOTH KNOW THAT,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT HIS BEHAVIOR, IT'S ERRATIC.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - HE'S STRESSED. - YOU LOVE HIM,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT TO THE N.S.C. HE'S CONSIDERED A TRAITOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT IS NOT TERRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HOPE IT'S NOT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF HE CALLS YOU HERE, YOU MUST TELL HIM TO CONTACT ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M HIS ONLY HOPE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'VE ALREADY LOST ONE HUSBAND.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WOULD BE A SHAME TO LOSE ANOTHER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, ARE YOU HAVING A ROUGH ONE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - YOU SAY SOMETHING? - A ROUGH NIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU DON'T WANT TO KNOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WANT TO TALK ABOUT IT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO, THANKS. I'M GONNA USE THE PHONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SORRY, I DIDN'T MEAN TO PRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU HEAR ANYTHING, JASON, PLEASE CALL ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Hello? Hello?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, GOOD LUCK!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT'S WITH THIS FUCKING BOX?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE THING ABOUT DOUGHNUTS, THEY'RE ALWAYS BETTER BY THE DOZEN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Boy: WE DON'T WANT TO SEE ANY MORE OF YOU FUCKING BUMS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - Boy: YOU SCARE THE CUSTOMERS AWAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'RE TRYING TO RUN A BUSINESS HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TELL YOUR BUDDIES THAT I DON'T WANT TO SEE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A SINGLE GODDAMN BUM IN THIS ALLEY!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU STINK, MAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T YOU HAVE ANY RESPECT FOR YOURSELF?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT PERSONALLY OFFENDS ME TO SMELL YOU!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COME ON, STICKS. LET'S GO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET'S GET THE HELL OUT OF HERE, MAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - THAT WAS CLOSE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: PLEASE DON'T HURT ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OKAY, POLICE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S ALL RIGHT, HANK. IT'S US.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE DON'T HURT ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - EASY, EASY. - POLICE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EASY DOES IT, HANK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT'S GOING ON DOWN HERE, HANK?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S GONNA COME DOWN AND DESTROY THEM!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S COMING!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'LL SEE,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S GONNA COME DOWN AND HE'S GONNA DESTROY US!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE NEEDS TO SLEEP IT OFF.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'LL SEE, YOU WATCH...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'LL SEE...!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CLASSIC PARANOID SCHIZOPHRENIA, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'LL PROTECT US!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S GREAT. ADD THAT TO THE HEAP OF WEIRD SHIT GOING ON.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE GONNA SEE SOMETHING!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EVERYONE WILL SEE...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S COMING TO PASS JUDGMENT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S COMING, HE'S COMING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - EXCUSE ME. - WATCH IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WATCH IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S THE DUDE, MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HAVE YOU TWO THOUGHT ABOUT MY OFFER?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'LL MAKE A LOT OF MONEY WITH ME DOING THE LORD'S WORK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - SHIT, MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, YOU, PUSHER MAN,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - GRAB SOME FENCE. - YOU TWO STAY RIGHT THERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, PREACHER MAN, AREN'T YOU RECRUITING KIND OF YOUNG THESE DAYS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE ALL WORK FOR THE LORD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - YEAH, WORK THIS. -

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND OUR WORK HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE GONNA LEAVE THOSE KIDS ALONE, YOU HEAR ME?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE GONNA GET THE HELL OUT OF HERE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: I THINK THEY GOT RELIGION, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: COPS, WHAT A FUCKING JOKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man #2: IT WASN'T THE COPS WHO FORCED JOHNNY AND HIS BOYS OUT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: I HEARD IT WAS SOME KIND OF GHOST THAT SCARED HIM OFF.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JOHNNY WAS CREOLE. THEY'RE ALWAYS SPOOKED BY SHIT LIKE THAT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: WE OWN THESE ALLEYS NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANT A STEEL DOOR, BARS ON THE WINDOWS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND GET RID OF THE BUMS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ARE YOU SEEKING SALVATION?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT IS THIS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE DON'T TAKE CHECKS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: THAT'S RIGHT, MR. WALL STREET. CASH ONLY TO BE SAVED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU ALREADY SNIFFED ALL YOUR STOCKS AND BONDS UP YOUR NOSE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S CASH ONLY, ASSHOLE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BLESS YOU, SISTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET ME EASE YOUR PAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN THE END THEY ALL LUST FOR HELL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT THE HELL?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: HEY, WHERE YOU RUNNING OFF TO, CINDERELLA?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: NO ONE LISTENS TO ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - I HATE IT WHEN PEOPLE DON'T LISTEN TO ME. -

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE WON'T BE NEEDING GUNS FOR THIS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: EASY, DONNIE BOY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOUR BROTHER JUST WANTS YOU TO ROUGH HIM UP LIKE LAST TIME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Donnie: I WARNED YOU FREAKS. YOU DIDN'T LISTEN TO ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS OUR ALLEY NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WON'T BOTHER YOUSE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Donnie: YOU MADE ME LOOK LIKE A PUNK IN FRONT OF MY BROTHER, MAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NOW HE THINKS I CAN'T TAKE CARE OF THINGS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man #2: YOU ARE A PUNK!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Donnie: WHAT?! COME HERE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man #2: THE GUARDIAN'S GONNA TAKE CARE OF YOU!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Woman: OH, NO. OH, GOD, NO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, JOE, HE USED TO SING ME SONGS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JOE WAS NICE TO ME, HONEY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, GOD, WE CAME HERE BECAUSE OF THE GUARDIAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE WAS GONNA PROTECT US.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T KNOW, LUCY. MAYBE THEY'RE JUST STORIES.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Lucy: NO, NO, HE'S OUR ANGEL,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OUR GUARDIAN ANGEL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S OURS. HE KNOWS HOW WE FEEL BECAUSE HE'S LIKE US.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAYBE JOE DIDN'T BELIEVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAVE TO BELIEVE IN HIM, ARNIE, OR HE WON'T COME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S WHAT YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO DO. POOR JOE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY DO WE HAVE TO THROW HIM AWAY LIKE THIS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE WATER'S SO DIRTY AND COLD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO. PLEASE, OH, PLEASE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE, PLEASE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE DON'T, PLEASE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TAKE LUCY AWAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LUCY, LET'S GO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: JOE IS GONNA BE OKAY, LUCY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO ONE CAN HURT HIM NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH... THAT'S RIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO ONE CAN HURT YOU NOW, JOE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWO WHOLE MONTHS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WISH I DIDN'T HAVE TO GO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW ABOUT SOMETHING NICE TO REMEMBER ME BY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHERE WAS HE? HE WAS SUPPOSED TO PROTECT US, PASS JUDGMENT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S ME, HANK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU SCARED THE SHIT OUT OF ME, MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, COULD I HAVE A DRINK, MAN, PLEASE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE DIDN'T DO SHIT. YOU'RE THE ONE WHO TOLD US ABOUT HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY ISN'T HE HERE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS HE SCARED TO DO ANYTHING, LIKE COPS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WELL, MAYBE HE'S NOT REAL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST MORE OF YOUR DRUNK TALK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, HE'S REAL, HANK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M TELLING YOU, HE'S BULLSHIT, GAREB!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - IT'S HIM! - HE'S FOR REAL?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE YOU ARE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, AL, I'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WAIT, DID YOU HEAR WHAT HAPPENED TO US?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT GANG, THEY WENT AND...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE SONS OF BITCHES WENT AND KILLED JOE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BASTARDS. THEY KILLED HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AL, HELP US. YOU GOTTA DO SOMETHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT SHOULD I DO WITH THEM?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: KILL... I MEAN...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T KNOW WHAT I MEAN... GET RID OF THEM!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T DO OTHER PEOPLE'S KILLINGS ANYMORE, GAREB.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I FEEL NOTHING FOR YOU OR THE OTHERS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS PLACE HAS THE STINK OF HELL ALL OVER IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GOOD TO NO ONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN'T EVEN HELP THE ONES I CARE ABOUT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AL, WE'RE ALL JUST SCARED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AL, PLEASE,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I TOLD EVERYBODY THAT YOU'D HELP US, PROTECT US.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE'S SO MANY OF US HERE NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'RE TRAPPED HERE JUST LIKE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: I GOT QUESTIONS, SHITHEAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: I'M LOOKING FOR SOMEONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ONE OF MY DISCIPLES... REAL SKINNY GUY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WELL? - ANSWER HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S GOT SOMETHING OF MINE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S MY BIBLE AND IT'S VERY IMPORTANT TO ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE GUARDIAN, WHY DON'T YOU ASK HIM?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE GUARDIAN?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BROTHER, I'M YOUR ONLY SAVIOR IN THESE ALLEYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, A REAL SMART-ASS, HUH?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HAVE YOU SEEN THE SKINNY GUY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND I'll KNOW IF YOU'RE LYING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HAVEN'T SEEN HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU DO SEE HIM, COME AND FIND ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - LET'S GO. - Lucy: ARNIE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WELL, WHAT HAVE WE HERE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAYBE THIS ONE KNOWS SOMETHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THAT YOURS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT IS ONE BIG PIECE OF ASS, MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ARNIE, ARE THESE YOUR FRIENDS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, RIGHT, BABY, WE'RE FRIENDS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, THAT'S IT. WE'RE ALL FRIENDS HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, ARNIE, WHY DON'T YOU DANCE WITH HER?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, PLEASE, PLEASE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LEAVE US ALONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET'S GO, DONNIE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: "LEAVE US ALONE." IS THAT RIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - LUCY! - COME ON, BABY, DANCE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - Arnie: NO! - I LIKE TO DANCE, ARNIE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LUCY, COME ON!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, SHOW ME THOSE LEGS. THAT'S IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: THE OLD BROAD IS WASTED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: DO IT, DO IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OOH! OOH, BABY!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OOH YEAH! WHOO!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S PLAYING MUSIC FOR ME, ARNIE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - ENOUGH! - HEY, HEY, WHAT THE FUCK?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ENOUGH, YOU LITTLE SHIT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: LET'S GO, DONNIE BOY...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M JUST HAVING A LITTLE FUN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BEFORE THE OLD GUY KICKS YOUR ASS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Arnie: YOU THINK YOU CAN COME IN HERE AND PUSH US AROUND?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HUMILIATE US?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'RE NOT LEAVING!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Lucy: YOU'RE NOT A NICE MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE GUARDIAN'S GONNA GET YOU!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY HEY HEY,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LIGHTEN UP, DONNIE BOY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: YOU GO GIVE YOUR GUARDIAN THAT MESSAGE, OLD MAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MOVE! MOVE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: WHY DON'T WE BURY HER LIKE WE DO THE OTHERS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO! SHE WAS AFRAID OF THE SEWERS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S COLD THERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I PROMISED HER I'D ALWAYS KEEP HER WARM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: CAST OUT OF SOCIETY,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TAKING REFUGE AMIDST THE GARBAGE,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LIKE SPAWN HIMSELF,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THESE UNCLAIMED SOULS KNOW THEY WILL NEVER BE ACCEPTED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BY THE WORLD BEYOND THESE ALLEYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO THEY REMAIN HERE,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TRYING TO HOLD ON TO THEIR DIGNITY AND SANITY,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOPING FOR SOME SAVIOR... A PROTECTOR,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMEONE TO REDEEM THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: YOU PATHETIC PIECE OF SHIT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE SMOKING ALL THE MERCHANDISE. COME HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I OUGHT TO KICK YOUR SCRAWNY ASS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHERE'S THE FUCKING BOOK?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH YEAH. I GOT IT RIGHT HERE, MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: RELAX, EARL. YOU WORRY TOO MUCH, MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - WHAT THE FUCK?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHERE THE HELL ARE THEY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GONNA GO FIND THOSE TWO RAT-FUCKS RIGHT NOW

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND THE GODDAMN BIBLE,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO WE CAN ALL GET BACK TO FUCKING WORK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, WELL, I'M COMING WITH YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHOW YOUR FACE, YOU CHICKENSHIT!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, I GOT YOU, YOU SON OF A BITCH!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DONNIE BOY, DONNIE BOY, IT'S GONNA BE OKAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll GET YOU OUT OF HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - DONNIE? - GUARDIAN, GUARDIAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO ARE YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU BASTARDS!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU KILLED MY BROTHER!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - YOU'RE GONNA DIE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: HAS THIS HELLSPAWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOUND SOME SCRAP OF HUMANITY WITHIN HIMSELF?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR IS THIS THE ACT OF A PREDATOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHOSE TERRITORY HAS BEEN INVADED?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HAS HIS BASIC INSTINCT TO KILL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TAKEN HOLD OF HIM?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE KNOWS HE HAS LOST AGAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE REAL VICTOR HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E03 - Colors of Blood (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THE ONE WHO SENT HIM TO HARVEST MORE SOULS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: IS THE HELLSPAWN EVEN AWARE THAT HIS PRESENCE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CAUSES THE DESTRUCTION.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF THOSE HE HAD HOPED TO PROTECT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS HAS BECOME A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION FOR TERRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S NOT A CRIMINAL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'VE ALREADY LOST ONE HUSBAND,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WOULD BE A SHAME TO LOSE ANOTHER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: WE OWN THESE ALLEYS NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Arnie: HELP, PLEASE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I TOLD EVERYBODY THAT YOU'D PROTECT US!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS PLACE HAS THE STINK OF HELL ALL OVER IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: WHO ARE YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE GONNA DIE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: HE KNOWS HE HAS LOST AGAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE REAL VICTOR HERE IS THE ONE WHO SENT HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO HARVEST MORE SOULS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S BEEN SAID THAT EVIL IS PAIN

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DELIBERATELY INFLICTED ON A SINGLE HUMAN BEING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT IF YOU WERE TO TAKE THE POINTY WHITE HOOD OFF THE K.K.K...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR STRIP THE SWASTIKA OFF A STORMTROOPER...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THESE MEN SO FILLED WITH ANGER AND HATRED,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY'D ACTUALLY LOOK JUST LIKE OUR NEIGHBOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO I WONDER,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF THE DEVIL DOES EXIST, COULD HE HAVE BEEN MADE

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN MAN'S OWN IMAGE AND LIKENESS TOO?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND WOULD HE LOOK AS NORMAL AS YOU AND I?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: THE DREAM IS ALWAYS THE SAME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE ARE PALE RIDERS IN THE NIGHT,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CARRYING THE SWORDS OF JUSTICE...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AS WAS DONE WHEN MEN FIRST PUT ON THE HOODS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND SET THE CROSS ON FIRE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR ALL TO SEE AND FEAR...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ONE MORE OF THE OUTSIDERS HAS BEEN BROUGHT TO JUSTICE,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THOSE WHO HAVE TAKEN OUR HOMES AND JOBS,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DEFILED OUR COUNTRY AND OUR GOD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I KNOW NOW WHAT THE DREAM REALLY MEANS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I AM TO PREPARE THE WAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR THE ONE WHO IS COMING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I SEE HIS FACE EVERY NIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE SHARE THE SAME DREAM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE MASTER TOLD ME WHAT I HAD TO DO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE SPEAKS TO ME, AND I KNOW HIS NAME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE CALLS HIMSELF "MALEBOLGIA."

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE, SIR. NO SMOKING IN CAB.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE FORGIVE ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO PROBLEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHERE ARE YOU GOING TONIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GOING TO BROOKLYN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BROOKLYN, OKAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: I AM THE ONE TO CLEANSE AND PURIFY THIS CITY,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO RID US OF THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY'RE NOT LIKE US.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT THEY CAN'T REALLY HELP THEMSELVES.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY DON'T EVEN KNOW WHY THIS MUST HAPPEN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man #2: PLEASE...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T UNDERSTAND.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - I'M SORRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I KNOW IT'S NOT YOUR FAULT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND IT'S REALLY NOTHING PERSONAL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: IT IS NOT JUST THE LOST AND DISPOSSESSED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT HAVE GATHERED NEAR THE HELLSPAWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE ARE THOSE LONE PREDATORS...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE HUMAN MONSTERS,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THOSE WHO HAVE HEARD THE VOICE OF MALEBOLGIA.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHISPERING TO THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EVIL HAS SEEPED INTO THEIR EMPTY LIVES.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LIKE A STAINED LIQUID.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AWARE OF THE PRESENCE OF THE HELLSPAWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY COME TO THE ALLEYS TO BE NEAR HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY ARE DRAWN TO HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE IS THEIR SAVIOR...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEIR LINK TO THE MASTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HELL HAS SENT THEM TO BE MALEBOLGIA'S HANDS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COVERED WITH BLOOD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: I'VE FOUND YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET AWAY FROM ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: A WOMAN MAKES IT HER BUSINESS TO KNOW WHERE HER HUSBAND IS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Wynn: SHE KNOWS SHE'S BEING WATCHED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY IS THIS WOMAN STILL ALIVE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET ME TAKE HER, AND THE KID,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll KNOW WHERE FITZGERALD IS IN AN HOUR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND IF SHE REALLY DOESN'T KNOW,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WOULD'VE CUT HER TO PIECES.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll FIND HIM. DON'T WORRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WANTED US TO CHECK IN, SIR?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, RAYMOND. WHAT HAVE YOU GOT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHE HASN'T LEFT HER OFFICE ALL DAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHE SPOKE WITH HER GRANDMOTHER, HER DAUGHTER,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SEVERAL CLIENTS, and you.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHE'S CLEVER, THIS ONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: YOU KNOW I'M GOOD IN VOICE STRESS ANALYSIS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET ME BE THERE... NEXT TO YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHE'S NOT A PRO. I'll KNOW WHEN SHE'S LYING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF I FEEL LIKE SHE'S LYING, YOU CAN TAKE HER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: ASK HER ABOUT HER DAUGHTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS SHE MISSING DADDY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A MOTHER WON'T LIE ABOUT HER KID'S FEELINGS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Woman: WANDA?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S AFTER 9:00. WHY ARE YOU STILL HERE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE GOT SOME BRIEFS TO CATCH UP ON.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HONEY, WHY DON'T YOU RELEGATE THE CASES TO SOMEBODY ELSE?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AT LEAST TILL YOU HEAR ABOUT TERRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THANKS, LOIS,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT I HAVE TO STAY BUSY OR I'll LOSE MY MIND FOR SURE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WELL, OKAY. SEE YOU TOMORROW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU NEED ANYTHING, LET ME KNOW, OKAY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - NIGHT. - GOOD NIGHT, LOIS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WANDA BLAKE. - WANDA, JASON WYNN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - Jason, anything new? - YES. CAN YOU MEET ME FOR DINNER?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF COURSE I CAN. WHERE DO YOU WANT ME TO MEET YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll SEND A CAR AROUND TO PICK YOU UP.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - I'll BE DOWNSTAIRS IN 10 MINUTES. - See you then.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU LOOK EXHAUSTED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HAVE THE SAME DREAMS EVERY NIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TV reporter: There's been a recent string of disappearances,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: all in the Brooklyn area.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Police are investigating, but there are no leads at this time,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: and they're asking for the public's help.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: The most recent disappearance

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: is local cab driver Joseph Weiss.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: If you've seen this man,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: or have any information as to his whereabouts,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: please call the number on the screen.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DIDN'T GET THE MONEY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, I SWEAR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll NEVER DO IT AGAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE, PLEASE, BABY, COME GET ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, WHAT ARE YOU LOOKING AT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - Woman: ASTORIA, QUEENS, PLEASE. - ASTORIA IT IS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, THANK YOU, HONEY. IT'S BEAUTIFUL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO ARE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HAPPY ANNIVERSARY, BABY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, EXCUSE ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ASTORIA IN QUEENS, NOT BROOKLYN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M SORRY, THE TRAFFIC ON THE TRIBOROUGH BRIDGE IS...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT DO WE LOOK LIKE? TOURISTS? STOP THE CAB!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I SAID STOP THE CAB RIGHT NOW AND LET US OUT!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, MAN, LOOK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE ONLY GOT 50 BUCKS. IT'S YOURS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST LET US OUT HERE, OKAY?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I APOLOGIZE, BUT IT HAS TO BE THIS WAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - Man: DON'T. NO PLEASE, DON'T! -

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I REALLY AM SORRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AS HIS LAWYER, I'D LIKE TO KNOW

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF MY HUSBAND IS BEING CHARGED WITH A CRIME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Jason: I THINK THIS CAN BE RESOLVED IN TERRY'S FAVOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T GET MY HOPES UP, JASON,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: UNLESS YOU ARE SURE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll ALWAYS TELL YOU THE TRUTH, WANDA.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO, HOW ARE YOU MAKING OUT? HOW'S CYAN?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S TOUGH ON A KID.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHE CRIES FOR TERRY EVERY NIGHT,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND I TRY TO STAY BUSY AT WORK,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND TRY TO KEEP MYSELF TOGETHER FOR HER,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT I DO MY OWN SHARE OF CRYING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M SORRY, I DIDN'T MEAN TO DUMP MY PROBLEMS ON YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S ALL RIGHT, WANDA. I KNOW IT'S TOUGH.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT I'll BE HERE AS LONG AS YOU NEED ME TO BE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I JUST WANT TERRY HOME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: IS THAT HIM?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THAT THE ONE YOU WANT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO NO, I'VE JUST GOT TO MAKE A CALL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU CAN USE MY PHONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: UH, NO THANK YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS A PRIVATE CALL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll USE ONE OF THE PAY PHONES. EXCUSE ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHE'S LYING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WANDA. - Oh, Terry, where are you?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OUR OLD CLUB IN BROOKLYN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN BE THERE IN 30 MINUTES.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll be waiting in front.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TERRY, I LOVE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I LOVE YOU TOO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CYAN'S NOT FEELING WELL. I HAVE TO GO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HOPE IT'S NOTHING SERIOUS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E04 - Send in the KKKlowns (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHE'S BEEN RUNNING A HIGH FEVER.

text: SHE'LL COME GET ME.

text: THAT WAS VERY NICELY DONE, MS. WU.

text: YOU'RE PISSING THE MAN OFF.

text: THE LAST TIME I SAW HIM PISSED OFF,

text: YOU THINK I LIKE LOOKING LIKE THIS?

text: WE'RE NOT MAKING ANY STATEMENTS TO THE PRESS.

text: WANDA BLAKE IS STILL ALIVE.

text: THERE'S A STRANGE FAMILIARITY ABOUT IT ALL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
