media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A REPORTER?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - YES. - WHAT'S THE NAME?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MS. BLAKE? LISA WU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THANKS FOR SEEING ME SO EARLY IN THE MORNING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE, COME IN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Wu Over speaker: This is what I know:

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A man matching your husband's description

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: is being held at the 87th precinct.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY'RE TRYING TO TIE HIM TO THE BROOKLYN SERIAL MURDERS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M REALLY VERY SORRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Wanda over speaker: Look, Ms. Wu, I've checked.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE POLICE STATIONS, HOSPITALS AND MORGUES...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: No sign of Terry. How do I know you're not lying?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Did you actually see Terry?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MS. BLAKE, I KNOW IT'S TERRY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE ONLY WAY TO GET HIM OFF THE HOOK.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WOULD BE TO PUT PRESSURE ON THE GUY WHO FRAMED HIM,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: and that's Jason Wynn.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: THEY'RE STEPPING OUT NOW. THE REPORTER IS IN FRONT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick on radio: Take the shots when they become available...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: The reporter first, and then Blake.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: STILES, TAKE YOUR SHOT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick on radio: Someone talk to me.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Stiles? Yeager? What the hell is going on?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Are you out there?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Someone talk to me.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M COMING FOR YOU, JASON WYNN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: I'm coming for you, Jason Wynn.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT VOICE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WAS IN MY DREAM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWO MORE SLAUGHTERED.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS JUST WHAT I WANT HIM TO DO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'LL COME TO ME AND THEN WE'LL HAVE HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Officer: LEVEL-FOUR COUNTER-TERRORIST MANEUVERS?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR? NO ONE'S TALKING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Officer #2: PROBABLY ANOTHER LIVE EXERCISE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DIDN'T PICK UP ANYTHING OVER THE WIRES. I DON'T LIKE IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU DON'T HAVE TO LIKE IT. YOU JUST HAVE TO DO WHAT I SAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man on radio: This could be prom night, boys,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: a pre-empt spec war strike, so listen up:

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: From this moment on, I am the voice of God

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: in your headsets for the outside team.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I want our snipers on all surrounding buildings.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Civilians have been evacuated. Only kill shots.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: THE CHOPPER'S ON THE ROOF, WAITING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SURVEILLANCE EQUIPMENT IS ON-LINE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JASON, MY MEN WANT TO KNOW WHAT WE'RE DEALING WITH.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Jason: LET HIM BACK US IN, AND THEN WE'LL STRIKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE CAN SEE EVERYTHING FROM HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'RE READY FOR HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COMMAND CHOPPER, ANYTHING TO REPORT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Officer: I DON'T GET IT. NO BRIEFING, NOTHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S BULLSHIT. WHEN DO WE GET SOME REAL ACTION?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE GOT MEN DOWN HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man on radio: What the hell is going on?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man on radio: Who gave the order?!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Stop the doors!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - OVER HERE, NOW! - Man: WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET THESE DOORS OPEN, NOW!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CLEVER. HE'S TAKING OUT OUR SYSTEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S SHUTTING US DOWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I NEED YOU DOWN THERE, NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ALL TEAMS CHECK IN EVERY TWO MINUTES.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - STATUS ON POWER? - THEY'RE WORKING ON IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NELSON, STATUS FROM THE OUTSIDE TEAM?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AGENT DOWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NEED COMMUNICATION WITH OUTSIDE TEAM.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: We have an intruder.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man on radio: Find a way into this goddamn building now.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS ONE'S LOCKED TOO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - SHIT. - GET OUT OF THE WAY. I GOT IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: HOLD YOUR FIRE!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMETHING IS IN THERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Officer: ALL RIGHT, LET'S MOVE IT! COME ON!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: WE'LL GAS THE FUCKER OUT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHOOT WHEN THE TARGET'S CLEAR.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Officer: WHAT IS THE TARGET, MERRICK? I HAVEN'T SEEN ANYTHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'RE SHOOTING AT SHADOWS. WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Merrick: JUST FOLLOW MY LEAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT IS IT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET ME BACKUP.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I NEED A TEAM UP HERE, WYNN'S OFFICE, NOW!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE YOU ARE. I'VE BEEN WAITING FOR YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO ARE YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T YOU REMEMBER ME?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAD ME BURNED ALIVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SIMMONS... IS... DEAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T BELIEVE YOU!

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: IF YOU SEND HIS SOUL TO HELL,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'LL COME BACK AS POWERFUL AS YOU ARE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: FITZGERALD AND MY WIFE...

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WILL NEVER ENDANGER THEIR LIVES AGAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET OUT OF HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET ME... CHIEF BANKS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, DORSEY,

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT GUY YOU'RE HOLDING, WE RAN HIS PRINTS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE GOT A CALL FROM THE FEDS.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE'RE INSTRUCTED TO CUT HIM LOOSE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CUT HIM LOOSE? WHAT FOR?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S THE GUY FOR SURE, AND YOU AND I BOTH KNOW THAT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ORDER CAME DOWN FROM CHIEF BANKS HIMSELF.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CLEAN HIM UP, LET HIM GO HOME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T LIKE IT EITHER, BUT THAT'S WHAT WE GOTTA DO.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S BULLSHIT. CAN'T BE TRUE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HEARD ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NOW LOOKIT, THERE'S NOTHING WE CAN DO ABOUT IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST KEEP IT ON THE Q.T.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND GIVE HIM THE GODDAMN TELEPHONE CALL.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHOW YOUR FACE. DO AS I SAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HELLO, JASON WYNN.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I BELIEVE IT'S TIME

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I MADE YOUR ACQUAINTANCE.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HI, IT'S ME, BABY.

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, GOD, WHERE ARE YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ARE YOU ALL RIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S02 E06 - Hellzapoppin (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M OKAY. I'M FINE. CAN I COME HOME?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A HELLSPAWN HAS RETURNED TO EARTH SOULLESS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIS MIND RAVAGED, HIS MEMORY SHATTERED...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY TOOK EVERYTHING FROM ME!

text: THEY MADE ME A MONSTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE ALONE NOW, SPAWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AIN'T NO ONE COVERING YOUR BACK ANYMORE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I FOUND YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET AWAY FROM ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS TRULY WHAT HELL IS, OLD MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WOULD DO MY LIFE OVER AGAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN THE WORLD'S WORST SHITHOLE

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAN TO BE HERE NOW LIKE THIS!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S ME, WANDA. I'M YOUR HUSBAND.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T CRY, MAMA. THAT WAS THE SAD MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: YOU HAVE BROUGHT THIS EVIL INTO HER LIFE...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE STINK OF HELL BROUGHT BACK FROM YOUR MASTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO DO YOU THINK WRAPPED YOU IN THAT SHROUD?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WAS MALEBOLGIA.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ARE YOU GOING TO SEND HIM THE DARK SOUL OF JASON WYNN?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WYNN HAD ME MURDERED. HE'LL KILL WANDA TOO IF I DON'T STOP HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN'T GO ON LIKE THIS ANYMORE,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIDING IN THE SHADOWS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M SICK OF IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT YOU HAVE TO STOP THE SAVAGE KILLING.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: I'M COMING FOR YOU, JASON WYNN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - SIMMONS? - DON'T YOU REMEMBER ME?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAD ME BURNED ALIVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: MALEBOLGIA HAS BEEN GUIDING BOTH OF YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW DO YOU KNOW THESE THINGS?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BECAUSE HE WAS ONCE MY MASTER TOO.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO ARE YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GOOD OR EVIL...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE HAVE TO ULTIMATELY CHOOSE

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE ALL THINK THAT WE'RE GOOD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO WHERE DOES THE EVIL COME FROM? WHERE IS IT HIDING?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN THE LIGHTS ARE ON,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT SEEMS THE DARKNESS IS HELD AT BAY,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST SITTING THERE AT THE EDGE OF THE LIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT EVIL... IT EXISTS BECAUSE WE CREATE IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT NOT OUT THERE,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT COMES FROM THE INSIDE.

text: Man: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU.

text: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU.

text: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU.

text: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU...

text: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU.

text: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU...

text: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: WITHIN THE SOULS OF EVERY HELLSPAWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A BATTLE IS WAGED.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT SCRAPS OF HUMANITY CAN THEY HOLD ON TO?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EVERY HELLSPAWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ALL THE WAY BACK TO THE PRIMORDIAL PAST,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HAS LOST THEIR STRUGGLE WITH THE DARKNESS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO SIT AT THE RIGHT HAND OF MALEBOLGIA,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E01 - A Made Guy (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: THANK YOU, SIR.

text: WHEN YOU PLAY WITH MATCHES,

text: HEY, I DON'T CARE IF THE GUY RUNS AROUND

text: - IT WASN'T HIM. - TWITCH, WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?

text: HE SHOT YOU IN THE HEAD. I ALMOST LOST YOU, BUDDY.

text: THE SHOOTER PULLING THE TRIGGER

text: DIDN'T HAVE A CLAWED HAND.

text: I CAN SEE A MAN'S HAND.

text: YOUR MIND WON'T LET YOU FINGER THE GUY,

text: BECAUSE THE PERSON WHO SHOT YOU

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THE ONE PERSON YOU WON'T LET BE THE SHOOTER...

text: SOMEBODY YOU RESPECTED, SOMEBODY YOU TRUSTED.

text: BECAUSE YOU KNOW SOMETHING.

text: PUT HIS ARMS AROUND ME, BUT HE NEVER DOES.

text: WITH THE BABY ON THE WAY... YEAH.

text: WANDA, WHAT IS IT?

text: WITH EVERYTHING THAT'S HAPPENED WITH TERRY AND ME,

text: I'M THINKING ABOUT HAVING AN ABORTION, GRANNY.

text: YOU CAN'T, WANDA.

text: THERE'S SOMETHING WRONG, GRANNY,

text: WITH THIS BABY INSIDE ME.

text: YOU LOOK TIRED, GRANNY.

text: WHY DON'T YOU GET SOME REST?

text: I'M SORRY BUT I HAVE TO GET BACK TO WORK.

text: IT'S STILL GOD'S CHILD.

text: OF DISTORTING THE TRUTH.

text: WE ALL SHOULD BE CAREFUL ABOUT WHAT WE SAY.

text: IT'S BANKS.

text: YOU'VE DONE WELL, OFFICER.

text: THE DEPARTMENT IS PROUD OF YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THANK YOU, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHERE THE HELL ARE YOU GOING?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AL, IS THAT YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M HERE WITH YOU, GRANNY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M SO HAPPY YOU CAME.

text: IT'S HARDEST IN THE NIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WANDA AND CYAN NEED YOU.

text: I KEEP BANGING ON ST. PETER'S GATE,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT HE JUST CAN'T HEAR ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT SOUNDS LIKE YOU'RE SORRY THAT YOU'RE STILL ALIVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU MUST HAVE REGRETS TOO.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE THEY?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT I LIVED WHEN OTHERS DIED,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND THE LIVES I TOOK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GOD WILL FORGIVE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN I LET MY GUARD DOWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ALL THE GHOSTS COME BACK TO ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY GATHER AROUND.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT COULD A SWEET WOMAN LIKE YOU REGRET?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT I LIVED SO LONG.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOUR FAMILY NEEDED YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, DON'T GET ME WRONG,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GLAD I SAW THEM ALL GROW UP.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN JACK DIED, WE WERE BOTH OLD ALREADY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I THOUGHT I WOULD JOIN HIM SOON.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE LIVED ALL THESE YEARS ALONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU NEVER TALKED MUCH ABOUT JACK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF AN OLD WOMAN?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: I WISH YOU COULD BRING JACK WITH YOU

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE NEXT TIME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I NEED TO TALK TO HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE WOULD KNOW WHAT TO DO ABOUT WANDA.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE'S SOMETHING WRONG.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4

text: - I HAVE TO GO. - AL?

text: Cogliostro: THE HELLSPAWN IS DRAWN HERE,

text: TO THIS GARDEN OF STONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE STARES AT THE TOMBS OF THE DEAD,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WONDERING IF THEY ALSO SOLD THEIR SOULS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE HAS COME TO THE CROSSROADS OF HIS EXISTENCE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND HE MUST CHOOSE THE RIGHT PATH,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR HE WILL BE CURSED TO WALK THIS EARTH ALONE,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: REJECTED BY EVERYONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THAT YOUR GRAVE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS WHERE I BELONG.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE CAUSED SO MUCH PAIN BY COMING BACK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU CAME BACK FOR YOUR WIFE,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR LOVE. I WOULD HAVE DONE THE SAME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWO MORE BOUNTY HUNTERS HAVE COME TO KILL ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I SHOULD LET THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - THEY'VE COME FOR ME. - WHY?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY WILL TREAT ME AS A TRAITOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I TOOK AN OATH TO KILL HELLSPAWNS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT IS ALL I'VE EVER KNOWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HAVE SPARED YOUR LIFE

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BECAUSE OF YOUR HEART.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO ONE HAS EVER KNOWN WHAT IS IN MY HEART.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT YOU CAN SHOW THEM BY USING YOUR SHROUD

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR SOMETHING GOOD AND DECENT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ONLY THEN WILL YOUR NEW LIFE BEGIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO, DETECTIVE, WHERE'S YOUR SLOB OF A PARTNER?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AS I SAID ON THE PHONE, SIR,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANTED IT TO BE JUST YOU AND ME, COP TO COP.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IS THAT SO?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WELL, YOU'VE BECOME INCONVENIENT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MY FATHER WAS A COP, MY BROTHERS... COPS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COP WAS ALL I KNEW.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I JUST WANTED TO ARREST THE BAD GUYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN I WAS COMING UP IN THE RANKS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I ADMIRED YOU, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT DO I DO NOW?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE THE BAD GUY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M TAKING YOU IN TONIGHT, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ARE YOU OKAY, TWITCH?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO YOU WERE JASON WYNN'S BITCH.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWITCH GOT TOO CLOSE TO FINDING OUT,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO YOU SHOT HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GO TO HELL.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SIR, STOP STOP!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS ISN'T THE WAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT DO I DO NOW? DO I GO BY THE BOOK

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR DO I GET SOME JUSTICE HERE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MY GUESS IS THAT'S THE GUN YOU USED TO SHOOT MY PARTNER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AM I RIGHT?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I SHOULD HAVE PUT A BULLET IN YOUR HEAD

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LIKE I DID YOUR PARTNER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOUR CAN'T DO THIS, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE NOT THIS KIND OF COP. PLEASE, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO US ALL A FAVOR...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SAVE US THE PAPERWORK AND SPARE YOUR WIFE AND KIDS

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE NEWSFLASH THAT YOU WERE A SCUMBAG.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WILL BE THE FIRST TIME A DIRTY COP DID THE RIGHT THING.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAYBE YOUR FAMILY WILL STILL GET YOUR PENSION.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU THINK THEY'LL TAKE YOUR WORD OVER MINE...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU DUMB PIECE OF SHIT?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I should have put a bullet in your head like I did your partner.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EITHER WAY, YOU'RE NOT GONNA LIVE VERY LONG.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU DON'T DO IT, YOUR BUDDY JASON WYNN WILL DO IT FOR YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND HE WON'T BE SO QUICK ABOUT IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Clown: MAN, HAVE YOU HAD A BAD DAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE IS NO TIME FOR REGRETS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU CAN CHANGE AND DEFY HELL,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEN I CAN CHANGE TOO, AND DEFY HEAVEN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: THE HUNTERS... THEY'RE HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT HAVE I DONE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF I AM KILLED NOW BY THE HUNTERS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MY SOUL WILL DESCEND TO HELL FOREVER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST DO IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WON'T LET THAT HAPPEN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE'S A CHANCE

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT I COULD BE ALLOWED TO GO

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO THE ELYSIAN FIELDS WHERE WARRIORS GO

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO HAVEN'T LOST THEIR HONOR,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO HAVE BEEN KILLED BY A HELLSPAWN IN BATTLE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - I CAN'T DO THAT. -

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS NOT YOUR FIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY'VE COME FOR ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU KILL THEM, MORE WILL COME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT KIND OF HEAVEN WOULD KILL ONE OF THEIR OWN?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T YOU FEEL IT? IT'S ALL CHANGING.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE SIDES AREN'T AS CLEAR-CUT ANYMORE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN'T KILL FOR THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M TIRED. I WANT SOME PEACE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE, HELP ME TO END IT NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COME ON, HELLSPAWN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PLEASE, SET ME FREE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO, JADE, I CAN'T DO THIS!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO REGRETS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WILL SHE BE AT PEACE NOW?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - I NEED TO KNOW. - Hunter: SHE WILL...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SOMETHING YOU'LL NEVER KNOW, HELLSPAWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: KILL ME NOW. GET IT OVER WITH.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE NOT IN OUR CONTRACT,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT WE'LL BE BACK FOR THE CHILD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO YOU TRUST ME, GRANNY?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I TRUST YOU, AL.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GOING TO GIVE YOU THE ONE THING YOU WISH FOR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T BE AFRAID.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO YOU SEE THE LOVE IN MY EYES?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, JACK, I SEE IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I SEE IT IN YOUR EYES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANT TO GO WITH YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S NOT YOUR TIME, MARY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PEOPLE NEED YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JACK, PLEASE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll WAIT FOR YOU, LIKE I ALWAYS HAVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHEN YOU'RE ALONE IN THE NIGHT,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HEAR YOU TALKING TO ME, MARY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HEAR YOUR PRAYERS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - AL? - I'M STILL WITH YOU, GRANNY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DID YOU SEE MY JACK?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, SO YOUNG AND HANDSOME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DID YOU HEAR WHAT HE SAID?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE HAVE TO TAKE CARE OF THE ONES WE LOVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE ONLY BEEN BLESSED TWICE IN MY LIFE...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BY THE LORD, AND NOW BY YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WASN'T ME, GRANNY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WAS THE POWER OF THE ONE WHO SENT ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE YOU PREPARED TO DO?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I PLEDGE EVERYTHING I OWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: EVERYTHING I HAVE LEFT, MY HEART INCLUDED.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E02 - Twitch Is Down (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANT MY HUMANITY BACK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: EVERY HELLSPAWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ALL THE WAY BACK TO THE PRIMORDIAL PAST.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HAS LOST THEIR STRUGGLE WITH THE DARKNESS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T GIVE INTO THE DEMONS. YOU HEAR ME, SOLDIER?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T LET THE DEMONS TAKE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: WHEN YOU PULLED THAT TRIGGER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU MADE HELL TAKE NOTICE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SPAWN WAS BORN ON THAT DAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: WE WERE PARTNERS, JESS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FROM THE DAY WE MET, MY JOB WAS TO WHACK YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WHO GAVE THE ORDER? - IT WAS WYNN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I KILLED HIM...!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: CONFESSIONS OF A FRUITCAKE... PROBABLY NOTHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CHECK THE ALLEYS FOR ANOTHER BODY ANYWAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DETECTIVES BURKE AND WILLIAMS, I'M LISA WU, "WASHINGTON POST."

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE INVESTIGATING MURDERS COMMITTED IN THE ALLEYS OFF 42nd STREET.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NO COMMENT, LADY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HAVE YOU FOUND THE GUNS USED IN THE MURDERS?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Spawn: GET AWAY FROM ME!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: A HELLSPAWN CAN BE FREE OF THE CURSE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW CAN YOU KNOW THAT?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BECAUSE I AM FREE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Todd McFarlane: WE'VE ALL SEEN FACES THAT MAKE US TURN OUR HEADS...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PEOPLE WITH SCARS OR BAD BURNS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT WHAT IF IT WENT WAY BEYOND THAT?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT IF SOMEONE HAD A FACE SO UGLY AND HIDEOUS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT EVEN THEY COULDN'T BEAR THE SIGHT OF THEMSELVES?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S WHAT HAPPENED TO AL SIMMONS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NOW TRAPPED IN A BURNED BODY THAT'S NOT EVEN HIS OWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: RETURNING FOR A LOVER WHO'S NOW LOST.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE REMEMBERS THE WAY HIS WIFE USED TO TOUCH HIM,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CARESS HIS FACE, KISS HIS LIPS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE MIGHT AS WELL BE TRAPPED IN A STONY TOMB...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COLDNESS SEEPING INTO THE BONES,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SUFFOCATING IN THE TOTAL DARKNESS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: HOW DOES ONE FIND HUMANITY IN AN ALLEY?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW DOES ONE REGAIN ONE'S SOUL.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN AN ABANDONED CHURCH?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR THIS NEWEST HELLSPAWN,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS ALLEY IS A WAYSTATION...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIS SPECIAL PURGATORY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Priest: IN SICKNESS AND IN HEALTH,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: UNTIL DEATH DO YOU PART.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cogliostro: HE LURKS HERE IN THE SHADOWS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AMID THIS HUMAN DEBRIS, WAITING...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST INSIDE THE PORTAL FROM HELL.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT THIS IS NOT HIS DOMAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIS DOMAIN IS THAT OF BURNED SKIN,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIS SHELL OF NECROPLASM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND THE SCARLET SHROUD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHICH HOVERS AROUND HIM,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: PROTECTING HIM AND POSSESSING HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AT THE SAME TIME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - WHERE IS THE OLD MAN?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WHY ISN'T HE HERE? - I... I DON'T KNOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S A GHOST LIKE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE JUST APPEARS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AL, WHAT'S HAPPENING TO YOUR FACE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S LAUGHING AT ME!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, COME ON... IT'S OKAY, MAN. IT'S OKAY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LOOK, IT'S JUST THE CHURCH BELLS, MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: COME ON, IT'S SUNDAY MORNING.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - STOP IT!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LEAVE ME ALONE!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I AM STILL ALIVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DID YOU THINK YOU COULD STRIKE A DEAL WITH MALEBOLGIA...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND THEN RENEGE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS A GRAVEYARD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN FEEL THE DEATH.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, LOOK AROUND YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THESE ARTIFACTS ARE ALL THAT REMAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FROM HELLSPAWNS OF THE PAST.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY WERE CURSED LIKE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS THEIR SHRINE...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A REMINDER OF WHAT MAY BE YOUR FATE!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAYBE YOU'RE NOT A CRAZY OLD BUM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT DO THEY CALL YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I HAVE HAD MANY NAMES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN THIS TIME, THEY CALL ME COGLIOSTRO.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN HIDING HERE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE BEEN HERE FOR MANY YEARS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU SEE, I'M THE NIGHT CURATOR OF ANTIQUITIES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS HOW I HAVE KEPT THESE RELICS SAFE,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - WHILE I WAITED FOR YOU. - WAITED?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN EVERY AGE A HELLSPAWN IS SENT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I TRIED TO GUIDE THEM, AS I'VE TRIED TO GUIDE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT THEY ARE LOST SOULS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M NOT THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS YOUR TOMB.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT DEAL DID YOU STRIKE WITH HIM?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WAS THE TIME OF KNIGHTHOOD,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TIME OF THE MIST.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AFTER THE ENDLESS BATTLES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND THE SLAUGHTER OF INNOCENTS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT WAS I WHO WAS SENT BY MALEBOLGIA.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO COLLECT THE SOULS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND RIDE WITH THEM IN THE AIR AT NIGHT...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE RIDE OF THE DEAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT NEVER TO DIE. THERE WAS NO HONOR IN THAT...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: NOT FOR A KNIGHT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MY HONOR HAD BEEN TAKEN FROM ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I TURNED AWAY FROM KILLING,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE BLACK ARTS DREW ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I STRUGGLED WITH THE EVIL INSIDE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND USED SORCERY TO FREE MYSELF.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN THAT TIME I WAS KNOWN AS MERLIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU ARE THE BLACK KNIGHT, THEN I WANT ANSWERS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOUR FLESH REBELS AGAINST YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE SHROUD ATTACKS YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WALLOW IN SELF-PITY... YOUR LOSS!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T WANT TO HEAR ANY MORE TALK, OLD MAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU CLAIM TO BE SOME KIND OF WIZARD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHOW ME WHAT THIS GODDAMN SHROUD IS GOOD FOR!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WILL, OLD MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS IS NOT THE ALLEY, HELLSPAWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I MAKE THE RULES IN THIS PLACE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU ARE IN MY DOMAIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY MAY HAVE TAKEN YOUR HONOR

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT THEY STOLE MY LIFE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAME BACK FOR WANDA.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT SHE SEES ME AS A MONSTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DO YOU WISH TO FIND THE ANSWERS?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE YOU PREPARED TO DO?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I AM GOING TO GET MY LIFE BACK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF YOU WON'T HELP ME, I'll FIND THE ANSWERS SOMEWHERE ELSE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ONE OF YOUR OFFICERS FOUND A REPORT ON A COP KILLED IN THE ALLEYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Chief Banks: Jason, you're a busy man.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Why are you spending your time

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: reading our New York City police reports?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CHIEF BANKS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF I DIDN'T FEEL YOU SERVED A PURPOSE FOR ME,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WOULDN'T HAVE GOTTEN YOU NOMINATED FOR POLICE COMMISSIONER

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND WE WOULDN'T BE HAVING THIS CONVERSATION, WOULD WE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MR. WYNN, I-I DIDN'T MEAN TO IMPLY THAT...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE REPORT WAS WRITTEN BY AN OFFICER NAMED MAX WILLIAMS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Twitch... smart cop, thorough.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HIS PARTNER IS SAM BURKE... A MEAT-AND-POTATOES GUY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOUR SMART COP DESCRIBES THE SHOOTING DEATH

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF ONE OF YOUR BEST OFFICERS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: KILLED IN THE ALLEYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: The dying man's last words on earth were.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: "RED CLOAK"... FIND THE MAN IN THE RED CLOAK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T MOVE IN ON HIM UNTIL YOU CALL ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Consider it done.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE DAMN THING IS NO GOOD. THE SIGHTS ARE OFF OR SOMETHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WORTHLESS PIECE OF SHIT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - IT'S JAMMED! - FORTUNATELY...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN USUALLY SHOOT THE DICK OFF A SQUIRREL FROM HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LOOK AT THIS JUNK. STUPID GUN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Twitch: YOUR LACK OF AIM IS SURELY THE GUN'S FAULT, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LACK OF AIM, HUH?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT, TWITCH? YOU THINK YOU CAN DO BETTER?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU KNOW, TWITCH, YOU REALLY LOST YOUR SENSE OF HUMOR. YOU'RE TOO SERIOUS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU GOTTA LEARN TO LIGHTEN UP A LITTLE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET'S JUST SEE NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LUCKY SON OF A BITCH.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GIVE ME THAT GUN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BURKE! I THOUGHT THEY WEREN'T GONNA LET YOU BACK ON THE RANGE

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AFTER THAT INCIDENT LAST WEEK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, I'VE BEEN CLEARED OF THAT ONE. IT WAS THE GUY'S FAULT... HE SHOULD HAVE DUCKED.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE AT A DISADVANTAGE, BURKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOUR GUT KEEPS YOU TOO FAR FROM THE TARGET.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, TWITCH, I THINK THE CHIEF JUST CRACKED A JOKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ALL RIGHT, THIS IS YOUR REPORT ON ONE OF OURS

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT WAS KILLED IN THE ALLEYS?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE CLOSED THAT CASE. IT WAS OUR COLLAR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT COP WAS KILLED BY A CRAZY PRIEST.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BEFORE HE DIED, THAT COP SAID THERE WERE TWO OF THEM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT LEADS ME TO BELIEVE THAT MAYBE THE PRIEST HAD A PLAYMATE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE ALSO SAID SOMETHING ABOUT A RED CLOAK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I REMEMBER...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S A DETAIL I SHOULDN'T HAVE MISSED, CHIEF.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GET ME A PERP.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T CARE IF YOU GOTTA EAT, SLEEP AND BREATHE THOSE ALLEYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND I DON'T CARE HOW MUCH SHIT YOU STEP IN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU SHOULD FEEL RIGHT AT HOME THERE, BURKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: CHECK IT OUT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Man: You're missing the point, Lisa.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I don't want you to have a good time in New York.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I want you to have a lonely, exhausting trip,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: which indicates to me that you're writing a story

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: that will spill a lot of ink.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LET'S CUT THE BULLSHIT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IF I WASN'T THE BEST YOU WOULDN'T HAVE SENT ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: You got a thing for these psychos, Lisa.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: You always manage to get close to them.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YEAH, WELL MY JOB IS TO HUNT THEM DOWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY ALL GIVE OFF THE SAME SCENT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: What scent is that?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - Hey, Lisa? - YEAH?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: You're spooky. Now tell me what you have.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - THIS GUY WEARS A RED CLOAK. -

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, HE'S NO JOKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE MURDERS PEOPLE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GONNA FIND HIM

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND DELIVER TO YOU HIS HEAD ON A PLATTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LIKE DOLL'S EYES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: FOURTH TIME WITH THIS ZOMBIE AND WE DON'T HAVE SHIT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE GUY HAS NO PRINTS, NO NAME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND AS SOON AS HE STARTS IN ABOUT "THE DEAD GUY IS BACK," I'M GONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN'T DO A FIFTH DANCE WITH THIS TWISTED SISTER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S A GOOD THING YOU'RE GETTING SOME R&R, BIG GUY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A WALLFLOWER, HUH?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU SEE THIS? THIS IS A FORENSIC REPORT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT SAYS THAT YOUR DNA MATCHES THE CELLS

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOUND UNDERNEATH THE NAILS OF A DEAD BUM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE ALSO HAVE WITNESSES THAT SAY YOU KILLED

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THIS LESS FORTUNATE FELLOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WE FOUND THIS NEARBY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I SAW HIM BURNED TO A CRISP.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT HE'S BACK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S IT, I'M GONE. COME ON, TWITCH.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO'S BACK FROM THE DEAD?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE LOOKED AT ME WITH THOSE GREEN EYES...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT CLOAK... IT REACHED OUT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - AND TOUCHED ME LIKE IT WAS ALIVE. - DID YOU SAY CLOAK?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE'S GONNA DRAG ME BACK TO HELL.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TELL ME, WHO'S COME FROM HELL?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SIMMONS... AL SIMMONS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST CHECKING SOME DETAILS, SIR.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW'S THE CHILI DOG?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: KIND OF LIGHT ON THE ONIONS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E03 - Seed of the Hellspawn (480p - DVDRip).mp4

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'VE DONE WELL, OFFICER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: TWITCH IS DOWN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Todd McFarlane: WE WEAR MASKS TO PROJECT IMAGES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT AREN'T REALLY WHO WE ARE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY DO WE HIDE BEHIND MASKS?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT ARE WE SO AFRAID TO SHOW THE WORLD?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MAYBE WE'RE NEVER REALLY COMFORTABLE WITH OUR OWN SKIN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OR MAYBE WE BELIEVE THAT PEOPLE WON'T ACCEPT US

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FOR WHAT WE TRULY ARE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWITCH, CAN YOU HEAR ME? THIS IS SAM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LISTEN TO ME. NOBODY DIES TONIGHT. YOU HEAR ME?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE NOT GONNA DIE IN THIS SHITHOLE ALLEY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HEY, BURKE, I SAW...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE GUY WITH THE RED CLOAK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE CAME OUT OF NOWHERE. SHOT YOUR PARTNER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CHASED HIM BUT HE JUST VANISHED.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: LOOK WHAT HE DID TO TWITCH.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OH, SWEET JESUS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M GONNA KILL THAT FUCKER FOR WHAT HE DID HERE TO MY PARTNER!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WAIT FOR BACKUP! BURKE!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Burke: YOU HEAR THAT, YOU PIECE OF SHIT?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'll FUCKING KILL YOU!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: GLAD YOU GUYS COULD MAKE IT,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT YOU'RE A LITTLE LATE! SON OF A BITCH IS GONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I KNEW YOU WOULD COME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY'RE SWARMING THROUGH THE ALLEYS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN'T GO BACK TILL THEY'RE GONE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE'S ALWAYS SANCTUARY FOR YOU HERE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHY DO THEY HUNT YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THEY THINK I KILLED A COP.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I CAN'T HIDE FROM THEM ANYMORE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAVE TO STOP THE SENSELESS KILLINGS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE PEOPLE I KILL DESERVE TO DIE!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU PROJECT YOUR EVIL ONTO OTHERS AND THEN KILL THEM,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THINKING YOU'VE DESTROYED THAT EVIL.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU'RE NO DIFFERENT FROM THE OTHER HELLSPAWNS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND THEY'RE ALL DEAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT IS ALL FORETOLD HERE IN THE BOOK OF KNOWLEDGE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S JUST A MUSTY OLD BOOK. IT MEANS NOTHING TO ME.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE'S ONLY A SINGLE BOOK LIKE THIS ONE,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WRITTEN A LONG TIME AGO IN THE TIME OF THE MIST.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT CAN HELP YOU BREAK THE CURSE AND DEFY MALEBOLGIA.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HE MADE ME A PRISONER INSIDE THIS SHROUD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I ESCAPED THE SHROUD. YOU CAN DO THE SAME AND BE FREE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT FIGHTS AGAINST ME. I CAN'T CONTROL IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES YOU CAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TO BE MASTER OF THE SHROUD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU MUST BE MASTER OF YOUR HEART.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MY HEART IS DEAD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S WHAT MALEBOLGIA WANTS YOU TO BELIEVE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES, HE DID CHOOSE A MAN

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHOSE HEART WAS DARK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT NOW INSIDE YOU THERE IS SOME GOOD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: MALEBOLGIA IS THE MIND-KILLER

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND HE WILL SEEP IN LIKE A SICKNESS IF YOU LET HIM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THE SHROUD CONTROLS YOUR FLESH.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BUT THERE IS A WAY TO KEEP IT

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: FROM CONTROLLING YOUR MIND AND YOUR HEART.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HOW DO I FIGHT AGAINST AN ENEMY I CAN'T SEE...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT I KNOW NOTHING ABOUT?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: A PART OF YOU IS THE ENEMY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU HAVE TO BURY THE MAN YOU ONCE WERE

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BECAUSE HE'S DAMNED.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BECOME A NEW MAN, A BETTER MAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ONLY THEN WILL THE SHROUD SERVE YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: DON'T PREACH TO ME!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I NEED TO KNOW... CAN THIS THING GIVE ME MY BODY BACK?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT CAN GIVE YOU ANY FORM YOU CHOOSE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SO YOU HAVE YOUR FACE BACK. WHAT THEN?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I WANT TO SEE MY WIFE AS I USED TO BE...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I NEVER HAD THE CHANCE TO TELL HER GOODBYE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S ALL I ASK.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE IS A COST.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I DON'T GIVE A DAMN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'VE ALREADY LOST EVERYTHING.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THERE'S NOTHING MORE TO LOSE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU WILL BE VULNERABLE IN YOUR HUMAN FORM.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IN TIME YOUR SKIN WILL DECAY

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND YOU WILL RETURN TO THE FORM YOU ARE NOW.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ARE YOU STRONG ENOUGH FOR THAT?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHATEVER YOU DO, THERE WILL BE CONSEQUENCES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: SHOW ME, OLD MAN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ALLOW THE SHROUD TO ENVELOP YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HERE YOU GO.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: TWITCH... HEY, BUDDY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YOU GONNA MAKE IT. I TOLD THEM YOU WERE GONNA BE OKAY...

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BACK IN BUSINESS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M SORRY. WHO ARE YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: IT'S ME, TWITCH, SAM... SAM BURKE. I'M YOUR PARTNER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: OF COURSE... MY PARTNER.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cyan: NANNY NANNY NANNY NANNY NANNY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - NANNY NANNY... - Woman: CYAN, CHILD.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: STAY OUT OF THOSE CHOCOLATES.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND GET AN APPLE LIKE GRANNY TOLD YOU TO.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: ALL RIGHT, GRANNY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: Cyan: I'll GET IT, GRANNY.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: THAT'S ALL RIGHT, CHILD. I'll GET IT.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WHO COULD THAT BE?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: YES? CAN I HELP YOU?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: I'M LOOKING FOR WANDA BLAKE.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: AND WHO IS THIS THAT'S ASKING?

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: JUST AN OLD FRIEND OF HERS,

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: BACK IN TOWN.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WELL NOW, I KNOW MOST OF WANDA'S FRIENDS.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: HI, IT'S ME, CYAN!

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: - - I'M SORRY TO HAVE BOTHERED YOU.

media_file: SPAWN - S03 E04 - Hunter's Moon (480p - DVDRip).mp4
text: WOULD YOU LIKE TO COME IN AND WAIT FOR HER?
